developers: レンレン・エンターテインメント
publishers: レンレン・エンターテインメント

name: Pragma Arbiter
summary: Pragma Arbiter is a match-based multiplayer game with a series of different game modes where you can play as a mage, rogue, or knight. The game modes include Adventure, Casual Team Battle, Ranked 3v3 Team Battle, 1v1 Duel, and Arena.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story Six - Jane Version
summary: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice Sports" series!

name: Project Astra Dominium
summary:
Project Astra Dominium is a Tower Defense game with Basebuilding and Automation elements.
Build up your base to become a supply hub for Earth's desperately needed materials, gather resources while defending against an unknown alien threat and improve your tower's and AI capabilities.

name: Procedural Realms
summary: The game combines classic turn-based RPG combat with crafting and survival game elements in a giant procedurally-generated world that players can build and explore. Join other players in conquering a world rich with resources to harvest, monsters to slay, dungeons to explore, and treasures to claim!

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Pammy
summary: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story Five - Mark Version
summary: This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Pretty Bird 9
summary: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. He is the last bird from the nest that can't fly yet. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Press Play
summary: A person finds himself stuck in a loop of his regular life cycle. In order to break it, he'll have to take a few wrong turns and explore the world around him a bit deeper than usual. A Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Prepper
summary: The storm to end all storms approaches. Prepare for the onslaught of nature without, and the darkness residing within...

name: Pretty Visitors
summary:
A group of drug addicts calling themselves "Children of Lucifer" decide to "Cleanse" humankind by "Setting them free".

You play as Jacob and Jessica, a married couple who find themselves helpless in this satanic ritual and try to escape to save their lives.

name: Primrose
summary:
Primrose is a rather short psychological survival horror experience, Filled with disturbing and cruel creatures that appear to be thirsty for your blood.

No one will survive except you,
for you, shall be the harbinger of the wrath.
With or without knowledge, You will take part.
You will follow the chosen one on a path,
Filled with yellow roses,
that takes you to the end

name: Prince of Persia
summary: Prince of Persia is a 2D platformer that is commonly regarded as a progenitor of the cinematic platformer genre. Rather than following the more common jump-and-run mechanics, it focuses on careful advancement through fairly complex levels, emphasizing the protagonist's vulnerability and survival aspect. Rotoscoping technique is used to give more realism to the animation of the characters' movements.

name: Protocol: 47
summary:
Overpopulation! We're running out of space! We need to enact Protocol: 47!

Protocol: 47 - In the event of an humanitarian disaster Protocol 47 is used to select a celebrity to release an appeal/charity single or host a celebrity filled live concert in order to raise awareness of chosen disaster.

Play as a Superstar Producer and pen a new hit record that brings the overpopulation issue to the minds of many.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Mark
summary: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series!

name: Private Detective
summary: Private Detective is a procedurally generated murder mystery game, where you must solve randomly generated crimes by finding leads, questioning suspects, and gathering evidence from the crime scene to compare with samples found in the homes of the suspects. It plays a lot like an adventure game, but with a lot more deduction and a lot less inventory object puzzles.

name: Project Fog: The Wounded
summary: Play the character of Cheryl who got trapped in a mysterious foggy city. Wounded, she barely managed to enter an establishment to escape from the monster. She was then greeted by a man named Norman who rushed and killed the monster chasing after her. Norman tended Cheryl's wound after and left her some supplies to survive. The clock is ticking for Norman as someone dear to him is missing, and soon he'll have to leave Cheryl alone.

name: Promethean Legacy
summary: Promethean Legacy is a dice-rolling strategy game for the Commodore 64.

name: Project Ozone 3
summary: Project Ozone 3: A New Way Forward is a pack filled to the brim of mods ranging from tech to magic to even exploration. A Better Questing pack filled with "currently 1197" quests (if you include the reward system). Project Ozone 3 also supports pack modes as they become available (Normal, Titan and Kappa). Normal mode in PO3 will be "slightly" more difficult than Project Ozone 2's due to mod progression. There are still "simple" achievements after the main quests we just use Better Questing entirely.

name: Pretty Hentai Girls
summary: Relaxing puzzle game with pretty girls

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Hunting Party DLC Bundle 3
summary: Become an elite hunter with three new Predator premium classes with this DLC bundle featuring the Scar Predator, Chopper Predator, and Celtic Predator premium classes.

name: Project Sail
summary: Project Sail is an open world naval combat game set in a fantastical pirate world. Project Sail is a top down third-person arcade shooter with RPG and rouge-like elements. Discover unique locations, find hidden treasure, and battle against the pirate and royal navy factions.

name: Pro Yakyuu Greatest Nine 97
summary: This is a baseball game released as part of the Greatest Nine series for the Sega Saturn.

name: Project Red
summary: Project Red is a collection of Minecraft mods that aim to bring vastly improved Redstone circuitry through wiring, logic gates, integrated circuits, and more.

name: Pretty Overseer
summary: Pretty Overseer is an animated romantic dating simulator in the anime style. You are a young lieutenant overseeing the correction of magically talented individuals in the closed and isolated complex of the military Academy. Your main task is to maintain order and train recruits.

name: Primal Hunt
summary:
You are invited to the greatest Hunt in history! Journey through prehistoric biomes, tracking down and going one-on-one with the most dangerous creatures to have ever walked the earth, DINOSAURS. Face the ferocity of a pack of Raptors, the strength, and power of an eight-ton Triceratops, or the terror of a 30-ft Tyrannosaurus Rex.
With an arsenal of high-tech weapons and armor at your disposal, you are poised to become the ultimate hunter…if you can survive. As you master each hunt, your prey becomes more dangerous as they are upgraded with advanced cybernetic enhancements, equipped with armor, carbine machine guns, rocket launchers, and the lethal ion cannon.
Rise to the challenge! Face the danger of putting yourself in the path of nature’s most feared creatures, risk everything for the ultimate thrill, and flirt with immortality to secure your place in history as the greatest hunter to have ever lived.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Jane
summary: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series focusing on Jane.

name: Project: Mirror
summary: Project: Mirror is a world full of magic, their souls of beautiful girls have broken into several pieces during a violent and powerful storm. You are the only one who can help the beauties revive their souls!

name: Project Sphinx
summary: In this first-person puzzle-solving game, you're a robot with a mission on a space station. And like any great robot, you're going to have to explore, teleport and ricochet your way around the base, in which each room and corridor is a puzzle to solve.

name: Project Red
summary: Fight in the Blood Arena for your life. Earn, bet money and prove to your team your skills in a fair fight. (3v3, 2v2, 1v1) Blood Arena, poker and many more activities on Project Red will allow you to earn $EGLD while showing your skills to the whole mafia.

name: Prison Architect: Xbox 360 Edition
summary: Take control of the building and running of a maximum security prison as the critically acclaimed lock-em-up arrives on Xbox 360! Your Design, Their Fate Will you build and manage a prison to create social order where it’s failed in the past, offering rehabilitation and peaceful coexistence amongst inmates? Will your prison disregard human rights, impose intentional harshness and be devoid of any notions of wellbeing and freedom? The choice is yours.

name: Project Nosferatu
summary: A fast-paced Action RPG with a fully customizable arsenal combo battle system. Varied landscapes of an interconnected world bring unique dangers in each area, which tie together a complex story about the mystery of the nocturnal, subterranean species known as "Umbrakhs."

name: Price for Freedom: Avarice
summary:
A CRPG turn based tactical game with novel take on damage systems and limb based targeting. A deep engaging character based story with four main companion characters where your decisions and actions will change their responses and how they will approach you or solving solving problems for you.

All hand-drawn massive expansive settings, cities, wilderness, coastlines. These maps feature several interactive areas and even some procedural tunnel and cavern networks that you can explore.

Enemy behaviour is handled in novel manner as well, where they draw from a pool of cards and then perform whatever action is based on that card. The player can reveal the enemy hand, re-shuffle, or even discard cards permanently to get the upper hand in a fight.

Side content includes; hunting, fishing, cooking, arm wrestling, and treasure hunting. Collectable pinups are hidden through the game world and some side quests, romantic trysts or outright romps.

name: Prison Architect: All Day and a Night
summary: All Day and a Night contains 8 new wardens, 8 new prison maps and 8 new plots to expand your prison experience and bend the rules!

name: Pro Turkey Hunting
summary: Experience virtual spring gobbler hunting at it's finest! Whether you are a turkey hunter that needs off season action or a game enthusiast that enjoys playing true to life hunting simulations 'Pro Turkey Hunting' is the fix you need. Game play centers around the four wild turkey sub-species residing in North America; easterns, osceolas, rios and merriams. Harvesting each sub-species is referred to as the 'Grand Slam' of turkey hunting. Get close to that gobbler and use your calls and decoy to lure him in. But be careful not to move too abruptly, these old gobblers have incredible eyesight! Challenge yourself and see if you have what it takes to earn the coveted 'Grand Slam'!

name: Prison Architect: Jungle Pack
summary: Jungle Pack is an aesthetic pack that sets your compound in the deep and lush tropical forest. Far from civilization, you will need to manage your inmates while dealing with the dangers of nature. Do you think you’re up for this task?

name: Prizma Puzzle Prime
summary: Tile-based puzzle game with smooth and addictive gameplay, old-school isometric graphics and excellent music. The player's task is to connect nodes which have various functions.

name: Pretty Dinosaur Adventures of Ancient Earth VR
summary: Through 3D virtual methods, let players feel the fun of virgin forests and ancient Egypt by dinosaurs.

name: Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volumes 1-3 Bundle
summary: A collection of all three volumes of NIS Classics.

name: Priority Realignment
summary:
Nyx Gaming is proud to present Priority Realignment, a text-based dungeon crawler about fighting monsters... and letting them corrupt you.

Explore a procedurally generated dungeon, manage horny status effects, discover secrets, engage with a totally-not-satirical gacha system, unlock five bespoke endings, and more in this dungeon crawler where all the monsters would just love to make you just like them.

name: Prince Adamajapanahiko x Princess
summary: The prince from super modern kingdom Ajapanadamahiko alongside with his fiancee, from modern kingdom Akoreahan got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince and Princess decided to save all princesses.

name: Prototype
summary: A cinematic techno-thriller about the fate of the intermediate links of progress.

name: Proving Grounds
summary: Proving Grounds is a Turn Based Tactical Auto Battler set in a medieval fantasy world. Proving Grounds uses pixel art, a unique code based auto battler combat system, humor, and more easter eggs from movies and games than you can count to deliver a unique RPG experience.

name: Property Pro
summary: Build or purchase a property and manage it effectively. Make strategic decisions to maintain and improve the property, and address any issues that arise.

name: Project Tower
summary: Dive in Project Tower, a third-person shooter mixing intense bullet hell combat with a unique morphing ability. Imprisoned by the "Hiks", fight to the top of their deadly tower for freedom. Will you outsmart them and make your way out ?

name: Project-X Zombie vs. Machine Gun
summary: Project X is a funny little rpg zombie shooter, but no regular rpg maker game. The usual battle scenes are not used, you have to shoot the zombies with guns. This game is made for you if you like rpg maker games made different than they should. There is no real story, it's just a little fun game.

name: Prehistoric Warcraft
summary: This is a duel independent game! There are eight characters in it, you can play with your friends! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience infinite fun from it! It's definitely worth it!

name: Protos Magos
summary: Protos Magos is a Spellcrafting FPS with fast-paced combat. Explore a medieval setting and blast your way through a horde of demons. Create custom spells to suit your unique play style.

name: Probo Rush
summary: Probo Rush is a classic shoot 'em up bullet hell game with a boss rush twist. Fight against machines, aliens, and nature as you take on ten challenging boss battles. With adjustable health and an Assist Mode, Probo Rush offers a challenging but accessible gaming experience.

name: Primitive
summary: Welcome to the brutal reality of the Stone Age. Fight, conquer, dominate! An open world full of traps and unexpected events, breathtaking views, dynamic changes in weather conditions, deadly beasts, and hostile tribes - welcome to "Primitive" and dare to survive.

name: Project Zero
summary: Project Zero is an free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter developed by only one person at the moment.

name: Prisseceal, the Dazzling-and-Flaring Peach Princess
summary: The year, 202X. In order to retrieve peace to the city, Sakura Himemiya transformed herself to Prisseceal, and fought against the demons.

name: Project Screwed
summary: Work together with your friends in this stressful 4-player couch co-op game as you defend against hordes of enemies trying to destroy your base. Manage both your time and your resources in an effort to balance all the needs of your base. Are you and your friends up for the task?

name: Project Planet: Earth Vs. Humanity
summary: Will you save your fellow humans, or destroy them as planet Earth? Impossible dilemmas and branching narratives create countless paths through cataclysmic disasters. Work with and against your friends in this 1v5 serious party game.

name: Project Labyrinth
summary: Join your friends in a 2D online multiplayer board game experience. Slide tiles around the board to make paths and collect goals and power-ups. Use the board to mess with your opponents, and take you to victory.

name: Project Backrooms
summary: Project Backrooms is a 1-4 player exploration game. Explore the subluminal space known as the Backrooms avoiding entitles, puzzle solving, and discovering new levels. Free content updates with new levels, entities, etc.

name: Professor Layton and the New World of Steam
summary:
Professor Layton and the New World of Steam depicts the world one year after the events of "Professor Layton and the Unwound Future".

Due to a mysterious incident in Steam Bison, a new adventure for Layton and Luke begins!

name: Project Regolith
summary: Work together with a friend to solve a series of challenging non-Euclidean Escape Room-esque puzzles whilst exploring Outpost Rhea, a space station on the far reaches of Human-explored space where the crew has vanished under mysterious circumstances...

name: Prisma Light
summary: Embark on an adventure to investigate a mysterious light coming from the mountains. You, the Hero, must fight your way through hordes of fleshy creatures to traverse the fabric of space-time to prevent Veganeti, the Ultimate Essence of Evil.

name: Project Eternal
summary: Project Eternal is a deck-building tower defense game. Use the cards you receive as rewards to keep creating unique combinations of turrets and defeat the oncoming enemies.

name: Pro Feel Golf
summary: Pro Feel Golf brings a fresh approach with unique and innovative controls that allow ease of use but with depth to grow your game. Become a golfing legend using intuitive one touch controls.

name: Project Slime
summary: In Project Slime: Outbreak, you'll battle against an army of infected slimes to save the world. Collect items, unlock special abilities, and upgrade your skills as you take on challenging bosses and explore a variety of environments. Can you emerge victorious in this fast-paced action game?

name: Prisonfall
summary: Prisonfall is arcade about escaping from a medieval prison. You are a prisoner in a prison with ghosts who used to keep order. It happened that you managed to get out of the shackles and now you can move freely throughout the prison. Can you go through all the tests and traps on the way to escape?

name: Propaganda Inc.
summary: Build an ultimate propaganda empire and use your influence to become a president of your country... no, the ruler of Earth... or even better, the overlord of the Galaxy! Propaganda Inc. is a satirical idle game, allowing the player to create their own propaganda machine.

name: Pretty Girls Breakers! Plus
summary: Brick-busting action returns with outfits to unlock for an even larger cast of beautiful companions!

name: Prospero
summary: Prospero was one of Valve's first game designs, slated to come out shortly after Half-Life.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 6: Apertura 2008
summary: Pro Evolution Soccer 6: Apertura 2008 is a community mod that adds a wealth of content about South American football.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 6: Legends 2
summary: ​Pro Evolution Soccer 6: Legends 2 is a fan-made modification of Konami's Pro Evolution Soccer 6, released for the PlayStation 2. Developed by the Legends Group, this mod introduces classic national teams and clubs that were prominent up until 2006.

name: Project: Summer Ice 5 - Ninja
summary: Ninja duo Levi and Vanessa investigate the "Project: Summer Ice"...

name: Project Chaos
summary: Project Chaos Is An High Octane, Manic & Chaotic, Multiplayer First Person Shooter. Set In 2098, A Team Of Rebels, Activists & Terrorists Band Together With One Goal: To Insight Change. Their Method Of Choice? Chaos!

name: Princess in the Mirror
summary:
A new title from the Otome Romance Series released in Japan in 2015, now in English!
From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the glitzy, fairy tale world of The Princess in the Mirror!

name: Primarch
summary: Primarch is a roguelike auto-battler centered on a single hero. After being exiled to a foreign planet, you are challenged by a fallen God and pitted against your comrades to determine who is most worthy of the title ‘Primarch’.

name: Project Null
summary: You wake up in a dark forest and you don't know how you got here and you don't remember anything. But somehow everything changed. You meet strange creatures and no one is very friendly in this alien world. Everything in this place are out to quickly end your little journey.

name: Professional Boyfriend
summary: An otome game by Voltage Inc.

name: Prizefighters
summary: Arcade boxing has made its return to the ring! Punch, block, and dodge your way up the ranks with simple one-hand touch controls and fast action gameplay. Time your dodges successfully and you'll be rewarded an opportunity for a knock-out punch. However, one mistimed maneuver can mean the difference between shining in the bright lights to being lights-out on the canvas!

name: Project B
summary: Project B is a free multiplayer browser shooter that doesn't require any registration to play. It contains two game modes: deathmatch and killrace. In deathmatch, players are ranked based on their amount of kills. In killrace, the player with the least amount of kills is eliminated after every round.

name: Private Crusade
summary: Make the battlefield your weapon to vanquish monstrous foes in turn-based, tactical combat. Explore the mysterious Drowned Lands in a tale of heroic fantasy inspired by the arcade classics of old.

name: Project Horror Tales
summary: When Travel plans go awry, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive to make it home alive. With something Lurking in the Dark. You are not alone. You will Have to Face the Darkness to Survive. The question is - Can you Survive?

name: Pro Evolution Soccer
summary:
Pro Evolution Soccer has more than 50 international soccer sides and 16 of the best club teams from around the world - ranging from Manchester United and AC Milan to Leeds United, who were briefly a top side at this time.

The player also has a large array of options. The player can play single matches as well as league or cup tournaments, and there is also a training mode. There are 5 difficulty levels, different weather conditions, and injuries are optional, as are extra time and penalty shoot-outs. Players can be designed with a range of physical and mental attributes, as well as different appearances.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010
summary: A port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 for Java ME-powered devices.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
summary: The PS2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2011.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
summary: The port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 for Java ME.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012
summary: The PSP port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2012.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2013
summary: The PlayStation Portable port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2013.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014
summary:
Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 for the PlayStation Portable is a handheld football simulation game developed by Konami. It features updated rosters, licensed teams, and several core modes from the main series.

The game includes Master League and Become a Legend modes, offering long-term career and player progression experiences. Despite hardware limitations, it aims to capture the atmosphere and pace of the full console versions, with streamlined controls and adapted presentation for portable play.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2017
summary: Mobile port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2017.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2019
summary: The mobile port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2019.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2019
summary: A Chinese-only mobile port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2019.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2023
summary: Manage a team of professional cyclists: control the budget, recruit young talent, train riders and devise race strategies. Jostle for position to reach the top of the world rankings!

name: Project: Pong
summary: The Pong game is very simple, but what if there were two balls? What if there was fire in the middle? What if the whole field was frozen? What if there was a snake? A cannon? Ghosts? Bats? Wind? Water? Portals? This is the kind of ideas that inspired me in creating Project:Pong.

name: Production Chain Tycoon
summary: Welcome to Production Chain Tycoon, the idle simulation game that puts you in the role of a CEO managing your industrial empire. In this game, you must use strategy and careful management skills to optimize your supply chain, increase production efficiency, and become the ultimate tycoon.

name: Protect Mother
summary: The hordes are coming for Mother. Keep her safe.

name: Presentiment of Death
summary:
Presentiment of Death is a fast-paced story-driven VR adventure of intuitive and aesthetic archery with an unusual passage of time, inspired by one of the best games SuperHot
Completely immerse yourself in the world with a special time dilation system, face robots and fight them because only in your power to stop the madness that is happening inside!
Remember that time is inextricably linked with archery, so get ready to act smart and think ahead

name: Pretty Girls Game Collection 3
summary: A collection of four games in the Pretty Girls mini-games series on a single PS4 disc / Switch cart. The bundle includes Pretty Girls Breakers!, Pretty Girls Rivers, Pretty Girls Speed and Poker Pretty Girls Battle: Texas Hold’em.

name: Project: Artificial Legacy Saga
summary: Embark on journey through the "Project: Artificial Legacy Saga" a four-part series, crafted to feel as if it was released across four console generations. Follow Kirana on her heroic journey, as she protects her family and her homeland from a mysterious evil force.

name: Primal Carnage: Extinction - Prehistoric Legacy
summary: Deck out your dinosaurs with over 200 unique looks!

name: Primal Carnage: Extinction - Mercenary Megapack
summary: Go dino slaying in style with over 100 mercenary cosmetics!

name: Predators
summary: The most dangerous fighters and killers on earth are transported to the Predators' home planet: a verdant alien environment where human beings are hunted as prey! Step into their world and a gaming experience like no other, where only skill, speed, and cunning dictate: are you predator or prey?

name: Propel Man
summary: Use the Catapult to dispatch the Propel Man to dizzy heights in the sky and cross each level by landing safely past the finish line by deploying your parachute.

name: Project Liminal Redux
summary: Project Liminal Redux is a first-person horror made in realistic 3D graphics. The gameplay consists of collecting notes, solving riddles and escaping from various entities. The main goal is to survive and escape.

name: Project: EagleBeak
summary: Project:EagleBeak is a mix of multiple modes of science fiction adventure game.You will play as a prisoner called ANN,imprisoned in an alien laboratory,find a way out of this matrix like laboratory.

name: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones
summary: In the mobile version of the last game in the trilogy, the Prince returns to Babylon after the events of the previous game, only to find out that a vizier has taken his throne. This new ruler has captured the Babylonian women. You need to set them free and defeat the vizier at the same time. Exposure to the sands of time, however, has awakened an evil presence inside the Prince, which manifests itself as the Dark Prince. During the game, you will often morph into the other presence, whose only goal it to reclaim the throne, the populace be damned.

name: Prince of Persia: Rival Swords
summary: The US version of the PSP version featured a lot of bonus content including bonus levels, chariot races and a multiplayer mode where two people can race to finish a level the fastest. The rest of the levels and gameplay is pretty identical to Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones with minor to no differences.

name: Prince of Persia: Rival Swords
summary: Prince of Persia: Rival Swords is the PSP port of Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones. The European version has less content the North American version.

name: Primal Planet
summary: Unveil a heartfelt story of family, dinosaurs, and UFOs! Craft, upgrade, and survive in a realm of primeval predators, savage tribes and... ancient aliens. Rise from a humble cave dweller to the planet’s last hope — alone or in local co-op. Welcome to the dinovania!

name: Project Apidom
summary: Project Apidom combines MOBA and RPG gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world. Build your character, scavenge, and fight in arena battles to become an unstoppable force while breaking the norms of usual MOBA games.

name: Project Horror Anthology: Project Prequel
summary: Project: Prequel is a multiple choice 2D Survival Horror game, with puzzles and exploration. Its universe is set within the Project Horror Anthology.

name: Project Unknown
summary: PROJECT UNKNOWN is a 1-4 online co-op horror game with unique playable characters and special abilities. Exorcise different ghosts, utilize a variety of tools, and immerse yourself in an experience full of horrifying visuals and complex mechanics.

name: Producer Tycoon
summary: A casual tycoon game where you play as an up and coming music producer. Design your character to look how you want. Select a genre and style, and wait to hear a random song from the selected choices

name: Protozed
summary: Coop extraction looter-shooter. Explore procedurally generated neighborhoods. Loot guns, food, and supplies. Build your base. Sustain your colonists' needs. Sneak and shoot your way out of mycelium-infected areas. Inspired by Project Zomboid, Zero Sievert, Tarkov.

name: Primal Fray
summary: Primal Fray is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built and synergistic team to learn the truth about the Rift.

name: Princess Survivors
summary: A roguelike action game in which beautiful girls fight against hordes of hordes to reclaim their castle. Strengthen her skills during the battle or enhance them in a shop. Become stronger and defeat their enemies.

name: Project Dark
summary: Project Dark is a narrative-driven, immersive audio game that draws on the classic “choose your own adventure” genre to create a unique and compelling interactive experience. The game’s impactful choices and its sophisticated binaural audio allow players to become so immersed in the experience that they can play with their eyes closed.

name: Prof. Miyamoto's Soroban & Flash Anzan
summary:
Soroban & Flash Anzan is a popular lesson to improve "non-cognitive ability"!
Let's continue practicing "Flash Anzan" every day, which is the most efficient way to improve your abacus-style "anzan" skills!

name: Protolife: Other Side
summary: Reverse Tower Defense game where you control waves of creatures against towers. Protolife game spin-off.

name: P-Racing
summary: P-Racing is an action-racing game for Playdate.

name: Prime Jump
summary: Prime Jump is a minimalist high score chaser. With just one tap, you can jump, reverse gravity, and swing.

name: Princess of Mekana
summary: After the King of Mekana falls ill to a mysterious illness, possibly due to poison, the Princess of Mekana must take regency and successfully claim the throne against various forces acting against her.

name: Pro Skiing
summary: Your lifelong dream is to become an Olympic skier. Now the time has come to see whether you can make it happen. Put on your old skis and navigate through a number of deadly obstacle courses on your way to glory or remain forever forgotten in this cruel reality that we call life.

name: Precious Stones
summary: This is a physics-based platform game where players control a sphere to collect diamonds while avoiding obstacles and hazards. The game requires players to use their knowledge of physics to navigate through levels filled with slopes and moving platforms.

name: Princess Puzzle
summary: Variant of Puzzle Pop.

name: Project: InfoGrid
summary: Project InfoGrid is 2.5d scifi rocket game. You are tasked with maneuvering through tight obstacles to reach the other end of each level. Starting simple but progressively becoming more unnatural as you progress through the tests. You'll need to adapt when to be patient or quick. Best of luck pilot.

name: Proun+ A Journey Through Modern Art
summary: Proun+ is a great combination of art and a racing game, inspired by paintings by Mondriaan and Kandinsky.

name: Primer
summary: Find all the prime factors!

name: Premonition
summary: Scavenge resources and find supplements to satisfy your addiction.

name: Project Bonsai
summary: Complete objectives in a fast paced roguelite game, where you must escape the island and find the mysterious Bonsai Tree.

name: Profi Girls
summary: We, girls of different professions, are looking for a boss. A boss should be tough but gentle, decisive and firm... Among us there is a brave firefighter, a sweet cook, a dreamy stewardess and others. Keep in mind that we need a real boss whom we would like to obey!

name: Pretty Princess: Magical Garden Island
summary:
Create the farm of your dreams!

Cultivate crops and raise livestock while exploring the island to collect resources and create goods in this fun fantasy farming simulation game where you are free to play as you like. Set in a cute European fantasy world, this next installment to the Pretty Princess series will delight all princesses – young or young at heart.

The residents of your magical island are depending on you to keep them thriving and content. Roam the island to collect ingredients and materials to craft the goods they need. Back on your farm, plant seeds to raise crops that will grow over time, and collect milk and eggs from your animals. Use the money and goodwill you earn from your hard work to decorate the island and make it your perfectly cute fantasy home.

name: Prince of Persia
summary: Prince of Persia mobile version of Prince of Persia (2008) with simplified gameplay and story is developed by Gameloft.

name: Premier Manager 2004-2005
summary:
Premier Manager 2004 - 2005 is a soccer manager where the player is responsibly for the athletic and financial success of his team. As usual there are a lot of details to take care of, e.g. searching for sponsors, stadium expansion, player transfers, lineup and tactics. But, as usual for English soccer managers, the emphasis is on the athletic aspect.

The matches itself use an abstract presentation: The soccer field is shown in a top-down, tactical perspective and the player movements are shown with blue and red balls. It also features a new meeting system where the player needs to convince the management of his views before important decisions.

name: Professor Goodboi's Ballistics
summary: Use your wits, some tools and a dash of physics as you guide the football to the exit in this fun-filled puzzle game. Items like ramps, springs and spray paints are there to help you navigate through 6 different worlds - each with their own challenges and characteristics.

name: Project Below
summary: In Project Below you wake up locked inside an unknown place and you have to find your way out of that place.

name: Prince of Persia Classic
summary: A Java mobile version of Prince of Persia Classic.

name: Prince of Persia
summary: The Game Boy port of Prince of Persia.

name: Project Bloom
summary: A turn based RPG rogue-like. Gain the tactical advantage with the Time-based battle system. Recruit, train and lead your heroes against the treacherous foes awaiting in the Dream Realm

name: Prophecy Island
summary: Prophecy Island is a randomly generated open world action rpg. As the player you get the opportunity to start an entirely new adventure every playthrough, with a remixed main storyline, generated side-quest lines, a new island, new dungeons and so much more.

name: Precision of Insight
summary: 2D puzzle platformer with a lot of puzzles that will push your intelligence and problem-solving skills to the limit.

name: Progressbar Popup Fighter
summary:
Progressbar Popup Fighter is a spin-off game of Progressbar95, initially released on 22 December 2020, developed and published by Spooky House Studios.

It is about not overwhelming the CPU with a lot of pop-ups; if it gets overwhelmed, a BSOD will appear.

Even though the game received some updates that added new content and features, it is safe to assume it has been abandoned due to the lack of updates and discussion about it.

name: Pregnant Talking Cat Emma
summary:
Emma the Cat and Oscar are expecting little kittens! Wonderful, right? Too bad Oscar had to go so far away to hunt, so pregnant talking cat Emma is all alone now. Thankfully, she has you! You’ll help your virtual kitty cat Emma go through her pregnancy, right? We all know that’s not easy and Pregnant Talking Cat Emma misses Oscar so much! She is so lonely without him, and she can really use some company and support. Be there for your pregnant virtual cat Emma, and help her prepare to be a mom! Play this virtual pet pregnant game and be the biggest support for your pregnant Emma!

As talking cat Emma is about to have three little talking kitties, she's going to need all the care a pregnant cat can get. Play talking cat pregnant games in order to take this pregnant mommy cat to her doctor so that the kitty cat virtual pet can do an ultrasound and other check-ups. Make sure her talking kitties are safe and sound.

name: Princess Quest Part 1
summary:
A Retro-style Action RPG starring the Mario Bros and Princess Peach!

Every 25 years, the Mushroom Kingdom throws a quarter-century celebration, called the Jubilee. The last Jubilee was held when the Princess was a child, by her father, the late King Toadstool.

It is during the Jubilee that a shocking revelation about the history of the Toadstool Family comes about...

name: P Rank 64
summary: Play through sm64 with the P ranks from Pizza Tower! Defeat enemies and collect coins to keep your combo timer up while you collect all 6 stars in each level. If you want to shoot higher than P rank, collect the 100 coin star as well for the brand new M rank!

name: Project Proxima
summary: Explore a star system while surviving the harsh conditions of space and whatever lurks in the darkness.

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
summary: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Project Hypnagogia
summary: An experiment set up by a mad scientist called "Hypnagogia" to reveal absolute fear by revealing the subject's most terrifying images into reality. The line between dream and reality is blurred. It's not easy to find a way out when there's only one scary dream going on around you.

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
summary: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Project CarnEvil
summary: Project CarnEvil, the ultimate VR horror experience, invites you to confront your fears. This game will test you to your limits with difficult carnival games and a crazed clown to banish. Will you be able to overcome your fear and escape alive?

name: Project Asteroids
summary: I have no feelings. I have no fear. I don’t know where I am, only my aim. I must work. And I’m working. My modules are outdated, but as long as they are, I’m useful. My body is rusted, but as long as I can move, I’m useful. I’ll hold on to the stone and live. I have no feelings. I have no fear.

name: Primal Rift
summary: Turn-based, solo character roleplaying adventure set in a prehistoric world!

name: Project Life is RPG
summary: A brand new game where "life" will be key.

name: Pro Soccer Cup 2002
summary:
Pro Soccer Cup 2002 is a football game, released just before the 2002 World Cup in Korea and Japan. The game has all phases of the world cup and the 32 national teams are in the game, but football players have a fake names, and haven't the characteristics of their real-life counterparts.

The game can be played with friendly matches or a full world cup. There are 4 stadiums and matches have fast gameplay: there are no injuries, shooting goes very quickly, and tackling is easy. The ball can be passed in three ways: short, long and ahead of a player. If a player doesn't have the ball, he can make a tackle or a serious foul. Strategically the team's formation can be altered and players can be substituted.

The game is in full 3D and matches are conducted in varying weather conditions and different times of day. There are eight cameras viewpoints during matches and there is no commentary. Multiplayer is supported for two players on a single PC.

name: Project Beksinski
summary: Game inspired by images of Zbigniew Beksiński.

name: Project: Playtime - Phase 2: Incineration
summary: Phase 2 is finally here! The horrors continue with an all-new map along with a host of new terrifying monster skins, and intricate survivor skins. Phase 2 also expands on gameplay with new puzzles, a UI overhaul, and a slough of quality of life upgrades.

name: Princess Arthur for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Port of Princess Arthur for the Nintendo Switch.

A king has left the world. In this country where for generations the king has been decided by the Holy Sword, a ceremony would be held to select the new king. Out of the many people who sought to draw the Sword, only one succeeded. Neither a knight nor royalty, the person was an ordinary girl.

Persuaded by the legendary magician Merlin, the girl begins to live as the king without understanding anything. It is there that she meets the Knights of the Round Table. The girl stands on a battlefield for the first time in her life. She grips the Sword tightly in hand, still not knowing why it chose her. Tears are in her eyes.

The girl learns what love truly is. Even as several threads of fate entwine around and trifle with her, she will continue to love only one. And so, the girl takes the sword in her hand. To cut open fate for the one she loves.

name: Project: Obscurion
summary: Project: Obscurion is an immersive spot-the-difference horror game. Use security cameras to explore detailed locations and uncover hidden anomalies. Test your perception and unravel the truth in this captivating horror experience.

name: Predatory Islands
summary: Predatory Islands is a real-time multiplayer online game. Start with just an island, develop technologies, build, extract resources and create weapons to attack other players. Different game scenarios set different goals for the players, victory is determined by their achievement.

name: Pressure Washer
summary: Pressure Washer is a VR cleaning simulation game. If you facing any stress, anxiety, tension, and worried, why not try it out? You just need to grab your pressure washer and get on with it. Your goal is very straightforward, wash out all the dirty little things from the surface.

name: Project Teddy
summary: Welcome to Project Teddy, the ultimate multiplayer game that promises endless fun and thrilling shootouts with your friends. Get ready to explore a game that was partially inspired by the popular games Garry’s Mod and Half-Life.

name: Press Axe
summary: It's a game to find the legendary duck using a double-edged axe.

name: Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion
summary:
Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion is a tiny adventure game made in one week for games made QVIIK.

The moth kingdom has been covered in spiderwebs! It's up to Poffin to find the spider responsible, and restore her kingdom to its former web-free glory!

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
summary: Dash into a stylish and thrilling action-adventure platformer set in a mythological Persian world where the boundaries of time and space are yours to manipulate. Play as Sargon and evolve from sword-wielding prodigy to extraordinary legend as you master acrobatic combat and unlock new Time Powers and unique super abilities.

name: Prinzessin Lillifee Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of Princess Lillifee in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Pretty Dreadful: Heritage
summary: Re:do left his quiet life in a village to pursue his career dreams in a big city. However, time passed and after graduation the guy found himself lonely and lost, not knowing what to do with his life. And that's when Re:do's past came after him and called him back…

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer. It follows Sargon, a warrior searching for a kidnapped prince in the cursed city of Mount Qaf. The game features acrobatic platforming, time-based powers, and a Metroidvania-style world.

The Deluxe Edition features the Immortal Outfit for the protagonist Sargon, the Prosperity Bird Amulet, and a Digital Adventure Guide to assist players in their journey. Purchasers of the Deluxe Edition also received three-day early access to the game.

name: Project Speed: Njarovik
summary: Do you want to play on a new map, but on the original Project Speed game? This DLC is for you! - This DLC adds the Njarovik map from Project Speed 2 to Project Speed.

name: Pretty Bubble: Flappy Adventures
summary: In Endless underwater world, very cute hero is trying to pass the obstacles. You join this adventure.

name: Presence
summary: Investigate, explore, and solve paranormal phenomena using technology as well as your own esoteric abilities, alone or with friends.

name: Project Hardline
summary: Project Hardline is a party first person shooter game where two teams fight to capture an uplink station. This uplink station contains vital intel and must not fall into the wrong hands. With every round a team faces, they will come back with better gear. This game is perfect for a party of friends.

name: Project Hoyrá
summary: Project Hoyrá is a Narrative Action-Adventure game in third-person view taking place in a brand new post-apocalyptic fantasy world. In the demo you will play as Elduin, controlling the water element, to try and find a lost civilization supposed to be the last remaining elemental nation.

name: Prospect
summary: Prospect is a turn-based tactics game focusing on immersive, in-depth combat and takes place inside a dystopian penal colony on a distant, hostile planet. In combat, take advantage of the powerful "Trial & Execute" system to plan, modify, and carry out the actions of your choice.

name: Project Hunt
summary: It is a semi-realistic hunting game. Animals are shot and killed with guns. The shot review shows animal detail and the bullet's hit.

name: Project Glasloc
summary: Project Glasloc is a co-operative horror game playable for up to 5 Volunteers. Work together to survive dives into old facilities trying to acquire and upload important data for our glorious organization. Nothing could possibly go wrong and don't worry about the employee turn-over rates.

name: Predefined
summary: Predefined is a 3D puzzle game where planning is key. Navigate a burrow through levels filled with puzzles and obstacles. Enjoy Twitch Integration for interactive gameplay and community collaboration.

name: Princess Peach: Showtime!
summary:
The wicked Grape and the Sour Bunch have taken over the Sparkle Theater, and now it's up to Peach and the theater's guardian Stella to save the play––and the day!

Peach can transform and use fantastic showstopping abilities to face off against the Sour Bunch.

Fend off the Sour Bunch with sensational swordplay as a swordfighter...en garde! In another role, Peach puts on her detective hat to find out whodunnit in a museum mystery. From kung fu master to pastry chef, Peach’s roles give you distinctly powerful ways to save the play!

name: Prince Maker-Braveness
summary:
Doujin game, similar to the famous Princess Maker series.

Raise a Prince into one of many different jobs. Different raising tactics lead to different endings.

name: Private: Pornmania
summary: Compilation CD-ROM set from FL Studio creators Image-Line. Features "over 1,200MB of hard-core movies for DOS and Windows," in addition to erotic themed games such as Porntris, Memory, Maze, Solver, and 'In the Jungle' which combines gameplay from all these games.

name: Project Fantasy
summary:
In revealing this project, IOI stated, “We are building a new world, a new IP – an online fantasy RPG. A world and a game built from the core to entertain players and expand for many years to come.”

IOI added: “For many, this journey is also a deeply personal one that began long before we started making games for a living – and it started with the fantasy genre. From the ‘Fighting Fantasy’ books compelling you to choose your path, alone, against wizards, lizards, and thief kings. To the togetherness, camaraderie, agony, and delight found around the tabletop."

“For some it meant taking the role of a game master: Part storyteller, part AI opponent, part guide, part villain. For everyone around that table it meant creativity, imagination, building a world together, and a shared goal in creating a great game experience."

“This idea – that a diverse group of individuals with different skills and strengths can work together and become more than the sum of their parts – is what inspires us. It inspires the fantasy world we are building – and it inspires how we build it.”

name: Prince or Villain
summary: A slice of life BL about a patissier who loves to bake. Kai feels left out when Percy and Gavin grow closer with one another. One day, Lance appears into Kai's life with a plan to have him all to himself. Will Kai stay with Percy and Gavin, or will he choose Lance?

name: Princess to Be
summary:
Mobile otome game developed by Dearead and published by Whomor.

Now included in the Story Me: Interactive Episode app.

name: Prince of the Resort
summary:
Otome game by Dearead.

Prince of the Resort - Love simulation otome game for women

name: Prediction Game
summary: It's a game to predict what it will say by looking at pictures and names.

name: Private Lesson with My Lover Teacher
summary: Private Lesson with My Lover Teacher is an erotic visual novel where the teacher, Tsukimori Misaki, suddenly decides to live with his student, Kido Yusuke, who doesn't know what to do in the future and tries to give him some help.

name: Project D
summary:
“For this game, we used the works of Rutger Bregman and Yuval Noah Harari as reference for thinking about humanity in the future,” co-founder and artist Hiroco Shiino said in a video featurette. “The game takes place in a future that could really happen. It’s about daily life in a place called Rakuen (paradise). I think the problems presented in this game will be very familiar to us in the real world.”

Co-founder and programmer Akira Mitsuhashi added, “This title was Hiroco’s idea, so Hiroco is the key person for this project. And I listen to Hiroco whenever she has questions, and we come up with a vairety of ideas together.”

name: Promise of Lingyun
summary: Promise of Lingyun is an archaistic role-playing game featuring hand-drawn Chinese ink painting style. Play as the main character to work for the welfare of the country and people in a mysterious palace of millenniums ago. The larger gameplay variety and random explorations overwhelms players with the love and hatred intertwined in the palace.

name: Project Parasite
summary: Step into "Project Parasite," a third-person sci-fi adventure game that delivers a rich experience in a compact format. As a robot on a desolate space station, you're tasked with a mission of utmost importance - to restore a failing power plant.

name: Princess Quest R
summary:
A port of Princess Quest for PC.

The game was illustrated by Sugiyama Genshō. It was based on a 1996 audio drama of the same name. The game was developed by AIC Spirits and Increment P Corp.

The story is set in the Dharma Kingdom, and involves the theft of a jewel. Clues must be sought after in dungeons, castles, and towns, until the true culprit is found.

name: Princess Quest
summary: A Role-Playing game, developed and published by Pax Softonica, which was released in Japan in 1986.

name: Professional Fishing 2
summary: "Professional Fishing 2" is the second installment of an exciting fishing game that takes you into the world of thrilling angling adventures. Step into the shoes of a novice angler, embarking on a journey with simple yet reliable gear.

name: Prop Game
summary: Play as a chair, a wizard's hat, a magnet and much more! You can then challenge your friends to solo or team mini-games.

name: Project F
summary: "Project F" is a tactical FPS game that features 5-on-5 team battles over defensive targets on a auto-generated map. All maps are generated for each match and never to be encountered again.

name: Primitive Society Simulator
summary: In this game, you'll be the leader of an ancient tribe, guiding your people to explore the natural world, to hunt, and to farm. As culture and civilization prosper, you shall establish a tribal alliance, a community with a shared future of tribes.

name: Project First Contact
summary: As of lately, there has been a rising occurrence in strange events and people reporting hallucinations. Unidentified objects are approaching Earth, while mankind in is full alert.

name: Project: Shiba
summary:
As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist. Yet, here you are. An outcast in a world that's not your own.
Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.
To you, things have always been black and white.
You've accepted your worth on this planet, and have accepted whatever torment the next day may bring.
You've accepted that you belong in captivity, locked away from the world, and have always been nothing more than some science project.
However, one day, in a spur-of-the-moment impulse...
..your entire life will change.

name: Prostitute Simulator 2
summary: Welcome to the second entry of the best prostitute simulator. In this game you will be able to satisfy your hottest desires. Work as a prostitute, get clients and enjoy amazing anime and realistic porn scenes with stylized 3D models.

name: Precious Theatre: Pilot
summary: The first installment of Precious Theatre ~an experimental magical girl yuri slice of life visual novel

name: Project B-Fer
summary: A short puzzle/escape room game where you can choose between engaging with the puzzles, or breaking through them.

name: Prodigious Avian
summary: Prodigious Avian is a casual game, where you play as Quercus thy magnanimous and attempt to evade the malignant clutches of the Robber Baron, who threatens to engulf you and all of Cymru. Flap your wings little birdie and do not allow the talons of an insidious wretch to besmirch your fair visage.

name: Protect the Planet
summary: This is a simple typing game. In the game, the alien from the UFO is very evil, he will shoot many missiles to attack the planet. You need to type and type, to destroy the missiles, to protect the planet.

name: Pro Philosopher 2: Governments & Grievances
summary: Dive headfirst into everyone's favorite topic: politics! Engage famous philosophers of all stripes, challenge their ideas, and change the world— or just tell everyone they smell terrible. NONSENSE!

name: Princess Paladin
summary: A dungeon crawler where you are the minion!

name: Primal Earth
summary: Open World Animal Survival Game Work together to increase your odds while bringing up the next generation. Explore, interact, and hone your skills to develop your character and become even stronger.

name: Protoshock
summary: Protoshock is a multiplayer first-person shooter that combines the fast-paced action with advanced movement; Players take on the role of creatures known as protogens, and battle their way through a variety of maps and game modes to rip apart their enemies.

name: Project Fireball
summary: Players, let's team up! Project Fireball is a futuristic fantasy-arcade footbrawl sport where the only rules are those you wish to follow. Join the 2v2 & 3v3 matches, choose your character according to its super ability and be the most skillful, bold and strategic team on the field.

name: Project Third Eye
summary: Enter the groundbreaking world of Project Third Eye, a VR physics game where creativity meets interactivity. Build anything with powerful tools and add logic using the visual scripting panel. Embark on an immersive adventure of endless possibilities. Get your copy now!

name: Protocol Delta
summary: Protocol Delta is a fast-paced twin-stick arcade game with minimal aesthetics. Test your reflexes as you try to survive relentless waves of geometric enemies.

name: PriPri
summary: "PriPri" is an ADV game where you explore maps, interact with characters, and uncover an escape plan as a prison staff member. Choose to befriend female prisoners and aid in the escape or ignore it, all while enjoying a relaxed gameplay experience without quest markers or time limits.

name: Provoron
summary: It's an adventure game about black&white crows.

name: Project Vostok
summary: "Project Vostok" is a non-linear horror visual novel about a group of airplane crash survivors finding a mysterious Soviet-era bunker in Altai mountains. Uncover a story full of drama, horrors and decide the fate of diverse cast of characters in this visual novel.

name: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator
summary: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator is a sequel to the warmly received Prison Simulator, but with an unusual twist - you're no longer a prison guard. You are the prisoner! Steal, sell drugs make deals with the guards, - whatever suits you, prepare for hardships you have never seen before!

name: Project Apparition
summary: Project Apparition is a 4 player cooperative paranormal investigation game currently in development. The aim of the game is to take on missions to investigate and remove ghosts from haunted buildings.

name: Project Stratarch
summary: Project Stratarch is a movement FPS designed around wall jumps, rewarding good movement on top of good aim. There are two game modes, both completely kill-based: Solo Deathmatch (Free-For-All) and Team Deathmatch.

name: Princesa das Nuvens
summary: Princesa das Nuvens is a chaotic game where the player controls the knight tasked with protecting a princess. But she has a fragile heart, so while repairing damage to the tower done by enemies, you need to calm the princess down.

name: Primal Rage
summary: Game Boy port of Primal Rage.

name: Primal Carnage: Evolution
summary: Primal Carnage: Evolution builds on the bones of what came before, taking dinosaur versus human combat to the next level. Featuring an expanded roster of prehistoric playables, evolved gameplay, and a wealth of brand new content to sink your teeth into.

name: Pro Tennis Tour
summary: Pro Tennis Tour ranks you 64th amongst the best tennis players in the world.

name: Project Vesperi
summary: Discover a sign of life on Venus and determine the fate of humanity in this story-driven, cinematic, branching narrative game.

name: Project A-ko
summary: A PC-88 visual novel based on the anime.

name: Project A-ko 2
summary: The second Project A-ko video game for PC-88.

name: Project Watcher
summary: The chaos will never end. Decimate your enemies, fight against hordes of invaders who know no mercy. Dozens of enemy types await you. Old comrades will stand in your way. Shoot first and never ask questions.

name: Pricolage: Idolized
summary:
Who are you...?
Pricolage: Idolized is an SNS-based interactive Visual Novel.

name: Projected Dreams
summary: Drag toys from the shelves and drop them on the table to create a shadow play in this cozy puzzle game. As the shadows unfold, immerse yourself in a heartwarming story full of nostalgia from the 90s and blur the lines between fantasy and reality.

name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire Plus
summary: "Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire" the solitaire game with Klondike rules, is now available in a powered-up version! Play solitaire against 11 beautiful girls, from cool beauties to tsundere ladies!

name: Project ST
summary: Jump into the madcap world of Project ST, a free online multiplayer party shooter stuffed with colorful characters, wacky weapons, massive robots, and fast-paced battles!

name: Prison Colony: A Convict's Tale
summary: Fight enemy vehicles on a procedurally generated, foreign world in this 3D Mecha game. Build better vehicles until you can afford your own spacejet, and escape the prison colony using that spacejet. Defend your base from enemy attack or pick the next mission to play.

name: Prison Life Simulator Jail: Gangster Escape Games Scary Architect Battle
summary: Outwit, Outplay, Outlast: The Ultimate Prison Life Simulator!

name: Procambarus Fallax
summary: This is a visual novel game featuring toxic wave of electricity with a gameplay duration of 5-10 minutes. You will spend some bedtime moments with your “best friend” that can be either enjoyable or less pleasant. Will you take the medicine?

name: Preacher
summary: Preacher is a 10-level PWAD for Doom II requiring a Boom-compatible source port. It was released by Darch in December 2018 and is a "musical conversion" based around medieval Christianity. Some music is provided by the band Those Poor Bastards.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer Collection
summary: Create an unbeatable team to call your own!

name: Project Americas
summary: Project Americas is a game that shows life in a criminal area as it is. You play as an ordinary fighter who has grand ambitions and strives for more. Make your way to the top of the criminal world, make your orders, create your gang, and keep the whole city at bay.

name: Preserve
summary: Preserve is a relaxing puzzle nature-building game in which you flourish a vibrant ecosystem by cleverly placing plants and animals to create a perfect symbiosis to your liking.

name: Praise Dead
summary: Praise Dead is a roguelike auto-battler where you create minions from the parts of dead villagers and monsters. Collect relics that power up your zombies. And defend the town from the nightly demonic incursions that threaten to slay us all.

name: Princess Maker 2 Regeneration
summary:
Princess Maker 2 Regeneration, an enhanced port of Princess Maker 2 Refine, will release on Switch, PS5, PS4, and PC on December 2023.

It will have English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

name: Princess Nom Nom
summary:
Her Royal Highness could really go for a snack, but Her Royal Butt is too tired to move. Food catering is a servant's duty anyway.

Pop a minion and order him to steal some food nearby. Then order him to get some more. Pop a new minion. Pop a fuckton of minions. Get a fuckton of food???

name: Precision
summary: This is a simple 2d follow the mouse game where you have to get to the end to win! This game can be annoying and hard to get through levels but can be very fun! If you touch anything red you will die.

name: Presentes de Natal
summary:
Every year, on the date that commemorates the birth of Jesus, Santa Claus distributes presents to children to remind them of the greatest gift God has ever given us.

But this year, Santa has a little problem, and he'll need your help to fulfill his mission.

Embark on this fantastic adventure to save Christmas, full of challenges and excitement.

name: Profiler: The Hopscotch Killer - Extended Edition
summary:
Examine the crime scenes, find clues and discover the serial killer identity. Will you be able to find him on time?
Miss Smith will soon be replacing Deckard, a police officer who is retiring. He will still be here a few days, to show her the ropes. And they won’t be resting: several cases are waiting for them. Obviously, it is more about murders than accidents or suicides… The murderer seems to be following a precise pattern… Miss Black and Deckard will have to investigate to discover who the serial killer is and prevent him from killing someone else.
Help them investigating and observe carefully the crime scenes: time is against you!

name: Project: Kate
summary: Project: Kate is a three-level PK3 for GZDoom by James Paddock. The wad is a tribute to fallen Doom community member Kate Fox, who was a close friend of Jimmy's. The first two levels are birthday gift maps by Jimmy for Kate, while the third was made after her passing in tribute, originally for Abyssal Speedmapping Session 32 and revised for this PK3.

name: Project Loro
summary:
After years of serving as a support studio for major projects such as Halo Infinite, Doom, and Perfect Dark, Certain Affinity is once again striking out on its own with an original project, codenamed Project Loro.

This news was revealed by company founder and CEO Max Hoberman, who described it as an "original FPS."

name: Project: Ahno's Ark
summary: This game merges elements of tactical RPG, Go, and introduces Roguelite features. Players will need to make decisions among numerous random events and capability divergences, trying to survive in an apocalyptic game of mutual destruction.

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress: Samurai Pack
summary: In this DLC, get "Jack the Samurai" as a playable character, customization of the level selection map and 5 additional new levels.

name: ProxOS
summary: Step into a time portal to 1993. While your friends are battling it out in the latest FPS adventures, you got the opportunity to learn the newest trend, programming. Turn on your CRT monitor and learn to write code, compete with others in challenges or write minigames.

name: Project VTS
summary: Project VTS is a real-time TD game. You'll need to build your defence around your base and defend against different enemies from all directions in various terrains of the alien planet.Use your turrets, obstacles, power supply, resource facillities to defend your base.

name: Pro Strategy Football 2024
summary: PSF 2024 - even more customizations! Sports Ticker! Waiver Draft! More stats! Improved AI! Improved Editor! Career can have 1 to 16 conferences and up to 140 teams! Fatigue and Injury sliders! More rules and overtime options!

name: Project K1
summary: Follow Rion Karmanz`s legend to become the first human Raja Rimba in this fast paced hack-n-slash action game that is inspired by Megaman and Devil May Cry series.

name: Project Colored Mountains
summary: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and a school, and a comically large grocery store...). Leap through a simulation and into real life while upgrading your abilities as well as defying the laws of physics. We really don't understand how this thing can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do.

name: Project_03
summary: Project_03 is aiming to give you the missed old school fps experience in the new era of gaming.Quick matches in various maps and gamemodes, also the practice range to improve your skills in a fun way.

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
Princess of Nothing
summary: Simple little F/F fantasy I made in a day to test out RPG Maker MV. Might expand on it, might not. Have fun.

name: Private Military Manager: Tactical Auto Battler
summary: You are the CEO of a private military company. Recruit capable mercenaries, purchase weapons, and develop your mercenaries according to their roles and characteristics. Observe how your mercenaries perform in combat and plan your tactics to ensure mission success.

name: Priscillas Dream
summary: In this Top-Down RPG game, players find themselves stranded in a vast and unforgiving desert, facing challenges and obstacles at every turn. The game begins with the player character waking up in the middle of the desert, surrounded by a small group of survivors who are also struggling to survive.

name: Project CARS
summary: A version of Project CARS which would run on lower-end hardware. The PS3 and Xbox 360 ports were cancelled in favor of the PS4 and the Xbox One, but the Wii U version was only cancelled later.

name: Project 32X: Sonic Mars
summary:
Sonic and his friends found out about the Cyberspace and its inhabitants, and Robotnik is using this world to create his empire, now everyone has to try to save the Cyberspace with the power of the Cyber Emeralds.

Project 32X is a fan game that attempts to revive the original Sonic Mars/Sonic 32X project.

name: Project: Sword Art
summary: Project: Sword Art is a visually stunning, engaging and addictive match-3 game that combines spectacular anime-style artwork, addictive gameplay and an exciting fantasy world. Embark on this magical adventure, defeat seductive girls and amass the largest collection in your gallery.

name: Project Otherside
summary: Project Otherside is a horror exploration game. Where players will be transported to an otherworldly dimension where they must navigate through endless spaces while being pursued by nightmarish entities..

name: Project Survival
summary: Project Survival is an anime fantasy survival-crafting, monster taming, open world adventure game that you can enjoy solo or with friends. Embark on an epic journey in a thrilling fantasy survival game that will push your skills and instincts to their limits.

name: Project Perun
summary: A sci-fi action-adventure game in VR.

name: Project Mix
summary: Project Mix is a VR anime cyberpunk bartending visual novel. What will you do when you've lost everything you once had?

name: Project DarkHeaZ
summary: Progress through short levels to face enemies and final bosses to save your life. Win and you'll level up, fail and you'll level down. The whole galaxy depends on you!.

name: Princess Bubble Story
summary: Bubble puzzler full of magic!

name: Prawngeon
summary: Sonic and Ö ran away from home and curiously Zodos knew where they were going. In Shrimpland is Prawngeon, a dungeon infested with shrimp and prawns, explore this mysterious place with Zodos and find his friends before it's too late (there really is no time). If you play carefully you can save a third friend!

name: Probationary Girlfriend
summary: I was given a contract to become lovers with a classmate for one month. After signing it, she's suddenly all over me...!?

name: Project Adder
summary: A run & gun zombie-killing rogue-lite with weighty responsive gameplay that’s different every run.

name: Project Adaloria
summary: An open world, free roaming, medieval fantasy realm. Survive and expand your own settlements amidst warring factions, dangerous monsters, and diverse characters. Choose your path: thief, trader, farmer, assassin, or colony builder!

name: Protecting the Base
summary: This is a tower defense game, where you can experience the charm of war from the game summary, reasonably prevent turrets, upgrade your turrets, and win victory.

name: Pro Shooter VR
summary: Pro Shooter VR is the world’s first Olympic-style shooting sports game in VR. Challenge yourself in a shooting simulation like never before!

name: Project N3T
summary: Take control of a test subject tasked with testing out a new device that functions as a powerful magnet. Complete a few tests by moving metal objects and using the magnet as a grappling hook in this short single-player experience.

name: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L.
summary: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L. It is a multiplayer TPS game with fantastic and colorful graphics, developed by a small team. Fight across multiple game modes and ever-growing maps. Take to the Field, Fight and Survive!

name: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L.: Silver Pack
summary: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L. It is a multiplayer TPS game with fantastic and colorful graphics, developed by a small team. Fight across multiple game modes and ever-growing maps. Take to the Field, Fight and Survive!

name: Pretty Pet Salon
summary: Run a pet-grooming salon! Pets must be groomed correctly to maintain customer satisfaction and the salon's profit.

name: Project;Hypatios
summary: Project;Hypatios is an FPS game inspired by Portal where Aldrich was cursed with a time-loop ability and must escape from Mobius Corps' Hypatios Lab by shooting his way through the chambers.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2024
summary: Welcome to Pro Basketball Manager 2024 - the best basketball management experience, offering unparalleled depth and authenticity across 160+ elite basketball competitions. Show the world you're the ultimate basketball manager!

name: Project Maverick
summary:
People Can Fly, the team behind games such as Gears of War: Judgement and Outriders, shared on Wednesday that the company has entered an agreement with Microsoft to develop a new video game based on a work-for-hire contract. The game, codenamed Project Maverick, is based on the "intellectual property rights owned by the publisher" and will be developed with a budget of $30-50 million.

Little else is known at this time. People Can Fly has expanded significantly in the last couple of years, growing with multiple studios around the world with seven games currently in development across over 600 staff.

name: Project Wunderwaffe: War in Ukraine
summary: Become a part of the alliance that supports the Ukrainian Army. Manage new-age weapon production and the largest modern military logistical hub. Build a strong coalition that will help Ukraine win in the shortest possible time.

name: Project Chimera
summary: We will save humanity by our knowledge. We need to just immerse in this environment.

name: Prin-C01
summary: An endless runner where you can control your speed. Run, trot and jump as you collect bones while avoiding speed blockers, pits and enemies. Or use your wits and turns those blockers against enemies. Play across multiple levels to beat the best score.

name: Project Adam: AI Attack
summary:
2222 AD,
Humanity will suffer destruction due to highly developed AI.

Adam, a special forces agent who survives, wakes up in a laboratory...
That place was the robots' giant space battleship 'Eden'.

Act like AI as much as possible,
Escape Eden from the eyes of AI!

name: Pro Golfer Saru
summary: The Wii version of Golfer Ape is a golf game that reproduces the content of the original manga and animation. The original is a golf manga produced by Japanese cartoonist Fujiko Fujio A. The protagonist is often called "ape" because he looks like a monkey. In the game version, players have to compete with assassins organized by Shadow Golf in the natural environment. The various nirvana skills that appeared in the original work also have a very gorgeous performance in the game. Using the somatosensory operation of the Wii remote control, players will be able to experience a very realistic feeling of hitting the ball during the game.

name: Pro Yakyuu Virtual Stadium: Professional Baseball
Probable
summary: A daily guessing game where players attempt to maintain the longest streak of correct coin flip guesses they can. Each incorrect guess resets the streak, and the daily challenge ends after four incorrect guesses.

name: Prison Gang Wars
summary: Take control of the gritty underworld as the mastermind of a powerful prison gang. Rise through the ranks, build your empire, and establish dominance in the unforgiving world of maximum security.

name: Project Entropy
summary: Welcome, commander, to Project Entropy- an ultimate Sci-Fi and role-playing mobile game with battles in space. In this immersive MMO experience, you will command alien civilizations, conquer uncharted planets, and build Hero fleets.

name: Prize Space Invaders
summary: Distinct gambling version of Space Invaders with heavy play costs.

name: Prize Tetris
summary: Gambling form of Tetris.

name: Privateer
summary: Privateer is a non-linear, single-player action RPG filled with space battles and shootouts. It’s a must-play game for anyone who enjoys 3rd person action-packed adventures in space.

name: Project Hybrid
summary: In Project Hybrid, you'll find yourself ensnared, desperately seeking an escape while unraveling the enigma of your surroundings and the mysterious circumstances that brought you here.

name: Protoplanet Express
summary: Embark on an exciting journey to explore distant star systems and witness the fascinating process of planet formation. In this immersive video game, you'll have the chance to learn about real protoplanetary systems based on simulations crafted by professional astronomers.

name: Prize Machine
summary:
Visit Prize City and try your luck on the prize machines! Find rare prizes! Collect full prize sets! Advance in levels to unlock new locations! You can do it all!
Win game tickets! Play scratch off games! Spend tickets on toys and prizes in the Ticket Exchange!
Try your luck on the Prize Wheel!

name: Pretty Chaser
summary: Arcade style racing game

name: Prison of Husks
summary: Assume the form of a doll and make your way out of this decrepit prison. Like a crossbreed between Sekiro and Demon's Souls.

name: Pro Football Agent
summary: Welcome to our thrilling football agent game, where you have the opportunity to build a successful agency and manage the talented players on their journey to stardom. You'll have the power to attract players to your agency, negotiate contracts, and guide them to the top of the football world.

name: Project Warlock: Lost Chapters
summary: Next Chapter of Project Warlock is here. A retro fps shooter that honors the legacy of classic shooters like Doom, Wolfenstein and Hexen picks up the story of Warlock mixing frantic gunplay, with powerful magic spells and perks and skills based character customisation.

name: Prezzies
summary: A colorful retro style matching game. Squash Prezzies and match splatter colors before time runs out.

name: Protocole: Hedera
summary: You embody Hedera, a young test subject imprisoned in an inhumane experiment... Escape, free your fellow test subjects, use logic, draw on your empathy, control your emotions, and above all, use your psychic powers in this completely crazy action game!

name: Project Volition
summary:
Clara is an Internet shut-in. But when her world is invaded by the web, she must come out and face the code.

Invited by her friends to an abandoned computer company building in their small town, Clara is faced with strange visual hallucinations and whispers of ascension through the cyber. Find clues, talk to your friends, and explore the glitch-warped building in Project Volition.

name: Project: Genesis
summary: You wake up in a research facility and hear from the managing AI that humanity is in crisis due to an unknown virus. The AI requests that you conduct various experiments. Recognizing the dangers outside the facility, you decide to proceed with the experiments.

name: Project Wingman: Frontline 59
summary: Project Wingman: Frontline 59 immerses players in exhilarating aerial combat, putting them in the pilot’s seat of a war-ravaged Earth’s most advanced fighter jets—and challenging them to prove they have what it takes to become a true ace.
