Balance their emotions with candy magic, manage your sugary stock, upgrade your powers, customize your appearance and raise everybody's quality of life!

name: Project Kyzen
summary:
Project Kyzen is a casual, multiplayer game in which players will have the choice to compete against each other in several different mini-games. Users can craft
unique avatars and explore the Kyzen universe.

Project Kyzen will be developed in phases throughout its lifetime in which players will be able to provide feedback to create the ultimate immersive experience in gaming.

name: Protect Your Gold From Barack Obama
summary: A satire RPG Maker game by ClickHole (a news parody site owned by The Onion), made to make fun of right-wing media portrayals of American politicians in 2018. Originally playable in-browser, any link to this game is now broken, and as such this game is possibly lost media.

name: Project: G-216
summary: Project: G-216 is a Horror themed Observation Game, where you monitor the CCTV feed of a cursed place to check it for supernatural annomalies.

name: Project_Structure_01
summary: Project_Structure_01 is first-person exploration game focusing on atmosphere and exploration of surreal liminal spaces that feature brutalist architecture.

name: Prenup Struggles
summary:
Prenup Struggles is the game that is about the story of a young man from Buriram who wants to marry a woman, yet he wasn't able to do that because of the high prenup from the woman's father.

The young has no choice, but to move to the new city to fulfill his dream

Or not?

name: Project Shaman
summary: Project Shaman is a demo about Turkic Mythology. You play as Kam, a shaman that needs to reach Tamag (Hell) and fight Erlik, the god of the dead. In this demo you are stopped by one of Erlik's 3 daughters, Kiştey Ana. You must defeat Kiştey Ana to get deeper into Tamag.

name: Primal Hearts
summary: After moving into a new town hoping for a new life, Kazuma finds himself the swing vote between two deadlocked factions representing tradition and innovation. Nicknamed “Triple Seven,” can he still live easy and find romance under his new status as a much-contested lucky guy?

name: Press Paws: Idle Clicker
summary: Press Paws is a casual, laid-back and cute Idle Clicker Game in Pixel Art style with mini-games.

name: Providence
summary: Providence is a free-to-play multiplayer co-op survival shooter with a strong narrative, challenging combat, and a unique player-driven economy. Providence is set in a universe ravaged by a catastrophic event known as the Singularity. Players, known as Trailblazers, explore alien worlds, compete for resources and craft items to survive.

name: Prophesy of Pendor
summary:
From the Founding of Pendor - the year is 354. A King has not ruled the shattered land of Pendor for many generations. What was once a proud accomplishment of man now is steeped in the myths of folklore and told as children’s bedtime stories. Yet, the legends live on of a prophesy of hope. A tale of a champion who comes from a distant shore and unites the lords of Pendor under a single Ruler and brings peace and prosperity once again to this ravaged war-torn land. All is not as it seems as there are many powers who have their own ends in mind and an epic struggle is about to unfold.

Strap on your sword, and buckle your imagination. Prepare to enter the world of Pendor and accept the challenge of the Prophesy - if you dare.

A total conversion mod of Mount & Blade Warband, it introduces entirely new factions, overhauled mechanics, deep immersion, and a completely original story filled with fleshed out characters, kingdoms, and mythologies.

name: Professional Bull Riding: Out of the Chute
summary:
A PSP Port of "PBR: Out of the Chute".

Gear up and get ready for the ride of your life. Players may create their own character and compete in season mode as a professional rider or a tenacious bull throughout 10 three-round events in multiple locations, including New York, Anaheim, and Las Vegas. Riders like Guilherme Marchi, Justin McBride and Chris Shivers as well as some of the most “rank” bulls from the tour are at your control. Compete in season mode or go head to head with your friends. Unlimited Ride mode tests players’ skills as a rider or bull until the rider is bucked off. Rider Rush puts you “in the zone” to maximize your score. Intuitive controls and multiple difficulty levels allow everyone to play, have fun and be challenged. Realistic sounds, heart-pounding music, official PBR rules and scoring capture the essence of being in the PBR.

name: Project Reignition
summary: Project Reignition is an on-rails platformer developed by KumaPauZ, also known as Kuma. This unofficial remake of Sonic and the Secret Rings, originally developed by Sonic Team and published by SEGA in 2007 for the Wii, aims to reimagine the classic game for modern systems. Built using the Godot engine, this open-source and free project features enhanced graphics, refined controls, and a smoother frame rate, offering a fresh experience while staying true to the original.

name: Project: ARK
summary: Project: ARK was developed for the first GBJAM over a two week duration.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2025
summary: Pro Basketball Manager 2025 is the ultimate basketball manager experience. Suit up and become the manager of a basketball team. You’ll have all the managerial tools you’ve come to expect in a manager game, scouting, facilities, training and more. Will you put emphasis on coaching or player development? Success is only the result of your decisions both on and off the court.

name: Princess Maker: Children of Revelation
summary: 「Princess Maker: Children of Revelation」is a raising simulation game that returns after 18 years as part of the "Princess Maker" package series, where you raise a young girl into adulthood. Become a parent in the game and help fulfill your daughter's dreams!

name: Project After: Shadow Theory
summary: Side-scroller beat am map

name: Project X-treme
summary: Project X-Treme is a remake of the cancelled "Sonic X-Treme" made by STI (Sega Technical Institute), which was cancelled in 1996

name: Project: Gorgon - Extra Character Slots Pack
summary: Need "alts" for crafting, storage, or exploring other gameplay modes? This will add three more character-slots to your Project: Gorgon account.

name: Project Rodeo
summary: Project Rodeo is a proof of concept for a 3D platforming adventure game starring Rodeo, a bat living in an old western/steampunk fantasy-styled world who sets out on a grand adventure throughout the known islands. Inspirations for the game include the Mega Man Legends series, Grandia, Tail Concerto and The Legend of Zelda series.

name: Proportionator
summary:
Embark on a quest to steal the Proportionator from a top-secret facility in this short, 8-bit-styled platformer!

Proportionator features a sleazy little guy called Paavo, just scooting around town, when he hears of a high-tech device by Vicinity Industries that can shrink and expand objects at will. After snatching it, you'll have to help him escape the compound by resizing almost any objects around you. Are you built to scale this challenge?

Proportionator is an 8-bit-styled side-scrolling platformer featuring a total of five levels across different biomes, dozens of different interactable objects, as well as a unique soundtrack by Francca. The game was developed over the course of four days (96 hours) for the GMTK Game Jam 2024.

name: Project Rogueteers
summary:
Third-Person "PVE" Co-op Shooter with Roguelite Elements
In the year 3000, humanity's last stand against sentient AI is at a stalemate. Choose your hero and unite in the digital world in a showdown against shadow algorithms.

Enter the Nullverse.
Everything happens in a virtual multiverse, where each world offers a unique adventure waiting to be discovered.

Choose your upgrades, and customize each run.
This world is full of possibilities with random abilities, diverse enemies, and ever-changing maps, the only certainty in Project Rogueteers is uncertainty.

Unlock Rogueteers, and flex their abilities.
You'll discover a diverse array of characters, each equipped with their unique abilities.

Ass whoop challenging bosses in co-op.
Gear up and rally your teammates to devise strategic plans that will help you vanquish your foes and conquer every mission.

name: Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S
summary: With the world at peace, the nine senshi challenge each other for supremacy. The player chooses one of the five Inner Senshi, the four Outer Senshi or Chibiusa. The fighting takes place in various scenes in Tokyo, with the player required to beat the senshi opponent two times out of three. The camera zooms in and out, depending on how far the opponents are from each other. The player can use special control combinations to invoke the senshi's special powers. After beating the other eight senshi, the player must defeat Super Sailor Moon to claim the title of Super Senshi.

name: Project Hive
summary: Enter the world of a not-so distant future, a reality where people transfer their minds into fully virtual environments. In this world, a new game, “Project Hive”, is the most popular form of entertainment - but what secrets does the Hive hold? Discover for yourself!

name: PRIN-C1
summary: An Endless runner with a twist! Play as a dog named PRIN-C1 who can walk, trot and run but cannot stop.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Complete Edition
summary:
Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer. It follows Sargon, a warrior searching for a kidnapped prince in the cursed city of Mount Qaf. The game features acrobatic platforming, time-based powers, and a Metroidvania-style world.

The Complete Edition features the base game, the Mask of Darkness story DLC, 3 outfits for Sargon, the Prosperity Bird Amulet, and a digital adventure guide.

name: Primordialis
summary: Primordialis is a physics-based roguelike fish builder. Unleash your creativity to defeat creatures using venomous tentacles, electrical shocks, or exploding children. The possibilities are endless. Explore the primordial depths to reveal its secrets and discover what lies beyond.

name: Project Mansion
summary: In a spiraling descent into madness, a broke journalist must confront ancient enigmas, survive eldritch horrors in a damned mansion, and face his own fractured existence.

name: Prison Life Simulator Jail: Glove Pack Expansion
Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Dark Prince Skin
summary: A Two Thrones Dark Prince–inspired skin for Sargon.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Two Thrones Skin
summary: A Two Thrones Prince–inspired skin for Sargon.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Complete Upgrade Pack
summary:
The Complete Upgrade Pack adds the following content to Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown:

• Mask of Darkness Story DLC
• Warrior Within outfit
• Two Thrones outfit
• Dark Prince outfit
• Immortals outfit
• Prosperity Bird amulet
• Fariba's Notebook digital art book

name: Primal Force Arena
summary: Primal Force Arena is a sci-fi, online competitive multiplayer game that lets players engage in fast-paced tactical turn-based battles, infused with action-packed elements and RPG touches. Embody your favorite Primal Masters, hone your tactics, enhance your equipment, and ascend to global dominance through thrilling game modes!

name: Project Ethos
summary: Project ETHOS is a free-to-play, 3rd-person roguelike hero shooter.

name: Propeller Rat
summary: Pilot a propeller-strapped rat through increasingly challenging, hazard-filled worlds with

name: President 47
summary: The republic is under attack, but the enemies of freedom are on the run. We've got them right where we want them, folks, as their schemes unravel and their plots are exposed for the whole world to see. We need you to help the 47th president to restore order. Stay vigilant, complete the journey.

name: Prettyboy Inc. is Hiring!
summary: A short horror visual novel about a job interview.

name: Proportions
summary: Proportions is an indie asymmetrical game where players take on the roles of either a giant or minis. The giant’s objective is to catch the minis, who must use their agility and cunning to evade capture. Designed with streamers in mind, the game features proximity chat to enhance the immersive experience and foster dynamic interactions.

name: Proverbs
summary: Proverbs is a picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle, inspired by Bruegel the Elder's 1559 painting "Netherlandish Proverbs"

name: Project Slippi
summary: Project Slippi is a set of modifications for Super Smash Bros. Melee, which adds several quality-of-life improvements to the game, of which are commonly used within the competitive scene. Among the most popular mod is Slippi Online, a Dolphin-based mod which allows rollback netcode for Melee over the internet. Other features include the ability to automatically save replays through the Slippi Launcher on PC and on the Nintendo Wii with Nintendont-Slippi.

name: Problem Solver Club
summary: Solve school problems, face problematic girls

name: Project Missionary: The Reckoning of Hizzokahpolis
summary: A kinetic visual novel about a CEO's search for justice and an unexpected happening.

name: Project Viper
summary: Project Viper is a point-and-click RPG. The key to mastery is the items you use and how you use them. Find a variety of unique items to exploit your enemies with. Progression is key to finding out who you truly are...

name: Princess Jigsaw Bundle
summary: Jigsaws filled with wonder and magic. They include princesses and puppies

name: Program Pack 4
summary:
Program Pack 4 is a double games pack that contains:

Breakout: Based on the arcade game where the aim is to remove all the bricks at the top of the screen by moving a bat left or right below and bouncing a ball upwards. If you let the ball pass your bat then you lose one of three lives.

Brikthru: Moving a bat left or right and bouncing a ball upwards, you clear the screen with a ball going through a shaded area and bouncing off the top and sides of the screen. If you let the ball pass your bat you lose one of thee lives.

name: Preekarity
summary: PREEKARITY is a large and very challenging limit-removing single map for the DOOM II IWAD. UV players should expect to have their skills tested on all fronts: combat, movement, resource management, and navigation. Beware of resource starvation, combat puzzles, and general meanness. HMP and below are more forgiving and more focused on the "fun factor," but should still provide some spicy moments for non-Doomgods.

name: Prisnhax
summary: Hack into 50 prison cells with light-based digital puzzle locks.

name: Premeow League
summary:
The Universe Need US! Let's Spoil Cat and Free the Universe.
We are the last stand to free the universe from Tyranny Cat Alien- Empurrer from Premeow76 Galaxy.
Spoil the cats and build your own Purrfect football team to compete in Premeow League and Win against Empurrer.

name: Prince of Persia: Escape
summary:
Have you ever dreamed to relive the legendary classic on mobile? Well that time has finally come!

Prince of Persia is an official mobile game based on an old classic game "Prince of Persia". Run fast, jump high and make sure to avoid the spikes!

Be warned, game is challenging! Learn the patterns and come up with the moves and proper timing to pass it! Do not give up, there is no challenge the prince cannot overcome! Enjoy tons of unique levels for you to beat! Retro side-scroller arcade in on your pocket!

name: Present Panic
summary: Mario forgot to bring Peach a gift for Christmas! Help Mario collect presents for Peach in this block pushing puzzle minigame.

name: Primal Hearts 2
summary: As new rivalries and old divisions threaten to split Ainoshima apart once again, only a new “Triple Seven” can restore peace once more! Torn between the machinations of the Liberal Arts and Sports factions, can our hero heal everyone's hearts—and steal just one?

name: Princess Snow White: The Enchanted Mirror
summary: Peace has reigned in the castle and the forest for several years, but a new threat begins to emerge from the dark past of the Evil Queen.

name: Princess Rapunzel: The Kingdom's Legacy
summary: This novel follows Rapunzel, who, after restoring peace to her kingdom, discovers that her legacy holds even more secrets

name: Project SJHG
summary: The Journey to Restore the Distorted Time and Space

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
summary:
Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands is a promotional browser flash game created to promote the Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands. Playing the game unlocked a costume in the main game, though that feature no longer works. The game is still playable on explosivebarrel.net

The game consists of six short stages. It is an auto runner where prince must dodge traps and attack enemies. On the first stage, Prince only has time rewind power after death. The second stage introduces a boss battle where Prince has free movement. From the third stage onward the bosses can only be damaged by the elemental attacks. The elemental powers are different on each stage. The second stage Prince has also dash power. Third stage swaps the dash for freezing power. Fourth swaps the freeze for fire shield and attack. The fifth stage swaps from fire to earth shield. The final stage is a boss stage where Prince can freely swap between the four powers and only the matching color on the boss' chest damages the boss

name: Project Songbird
summary: Project Songbird is a cinematic first-person narrative horror game set in the Appalachian forest. Take on the role of Dakota, a musician who must record their new album in a remote log cabin amidst a writer's block. Take caution, however. These woods were never empty...

name: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures
summary: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures is a mobile game port of Prince of Persia developed by Gameloft. The game was first released in September 2002 in a monochrome version on Siemens C55. The initial version lacked a combat system. The game was re-released in color, and with combat on several other mobile devices. Later versions also featured a music in the menu.

name: Prison Princess: Trapped Allure
summary: At long last a completely new sequel to Prison Princess, the mystery-solving adventure game where you guide princesses to escape the clutches of the Demon King!

name: Premier Manager
summary: A football management simulation game featuring teams from the 2010–11 English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, and Scottish Leagues.

name: Project Kizuna
summary: Announced during the Great Aquaplus Festival 30th Anniversary, it is a new RPG written by Suga Munemitsu, the creator of Utawarerumono.

name: Project Re-Rainbow
summary:
Project Re-Rainbow is a mod for Sonic Colors: Ultimate, with a primary focus on restoring the visual elements to better match the original Sonic Colors' art direction on the Wii, especially in regards to the colors and lighting.

In addition to these visual improvements, Project Re-Rainbow also offers fully remastered cutscenes, along with audio and bug fixes, improving upon the overall gameplay experience.

name: Project Borealis: Prologue
summary: Project Borealis: Prologue is a fan-made game which expands on the classic episodic series by Valve Software. Return to a snow covered Ravenholm and experience the iconic town reimagined in an arctic atmosphere and modern graphics.

name: Pro Flight Simulator
summary: With stunningly realistic exterior and cockpit views, you'll feel like a true pilot as you switch between multiple camera angles to find that perfect perspective. Fly through 40 challenging levels.

name: Pretty Girls Pop Match
summary:
When the Demon Lord takes your fellow adventurers captive, it’s up to you to rescue them, recruit them to your team and utilize their unique abilities to turn the tide against the forces of evil! Pretty Girls Pop Match is a match-3 game that gives you the power to raise legendary adventurers to overcome puzzle challenges created just for you!

Align colorful jewels in sets of three to earn the points needed to win! Collect enough points to unlock "magical items" that can clear all jewels from the map. Adventurer skills can enhance the effect of magical items even further! Level up your adventurers' skills with gems earned in each stage to grow the ultimate adventuring party.

name: Pranksters: Treasure of the Indians
summary:
In Pranksters a city is plagued by rowdies which play pranks on innocent people. Now the player takes the role of a male or female kid to set things right. There are basically two goals per level: Drive away all rowdies and gather enough money for the bus. This is done by playing either nice tricks, e.g. washing off graffiti, or bad tricks, e.g. using a banana peel so someone slips.
The usage of tricks influences the village's morale either positive or negative, when it gets too low the game is lost. To do tricks the player has to use and combine items he finds on the streets. These depend on the character's gender and are randomly distributed. When pranksters get a hand on the player they pummel him and he loses life energy.

name: Protocol Rift
summary: Third-person action-adventure game that seamlessly blends intense bullet hell combat with thought-provoking puzzles. Dive into the high-stakes world of digital warfare as an ethical robot hacker. Your mission? To infiltrate a fortified network and overthrow the tyrannical central AI controlling it.

name: Procedure
summary:
A game made very quickly for Flatgame Annual 2016. I had surgery with a general anaesthetic for the first time in my life just before Christmas. This game is my response.

I tried to follow the rules for a flatgame as closely as possible – to make me work differently. The most striking thing for me is how directly personal it turned out. I had a vague idea of what the game might be about. The graphics were abstract scribbles done in half an hour. The game was put together in about three hours. I'm aware I haven't done anything interesting with space in the game but the focus was very much on the story.

name: Project 2/3
summary: Project 2/3 is an upcoming open world ARPG independently developed by Diversity Game Studios. Read on to learn about its release date, what platforms it's coming to, and announcement history.

name: PrismNeedle
summary: PrismNeedle is a Roguelike Survivors game where you can take control of living magical helmets and fight waves of enemies using unique swords and upgrades.

name: Project P
summary:
Princess Peach is back in her very own fangame!

Bowser is back and causing even more mischief in the Mushroom Kingdom, now setting his sights on the infamous Super Star to be very powerful. Using his newfound powers, he is able to kidnap Mario and Luigi just to make sure that nobody gets in his way. But he does not know that Princess Peach was brave enough to stop him. Have Peach run, jump, kick, float, and fight her way through 8 huge worlds and save Mario!

name: P.R.D.A.
summary: P.R.D.A. is a roguelike deck building game, collect cards and items to build your deck, collect tarots that make BOTH you and your enemies stronger, Assign attributes that matches your playstyle, meet strange creatures may be helpful, take every advantages you can to accomplish your mission.

name: Pro Flight Simulator: Deluxe
summary: Take Off Into the Ultimate Flying Adventure!

name: Project 38
summary: "Project 38" plunges players into an abandoned research facility where mutated monsters lurk. Uncover the dark secrets within as you navigate eerie corridors and unravel a chilling narrative. With spine-tingling atmosphere and immersive Hindi voice lines, brace yourself for experience like no other.

name: Prologue: Go Wayback!
summary: Prologue: Go Wayback! is a single-player open-world emergent survival roguelike where every journey is unique. Traverse a new wilderness that is generated for you every time you play. Chart your path, overcome the elements, and write your own story of exploration.

name: Preface: Undiscovered World
summary: Preface is an immersive tech demo showcasing Melba, PLAYERUNKNOWN Productions' groundbreaking technology generating an Earth-scale world. In this project still in development, experience our machine learning agents creating a planet in real-time, directly on your GPU.

name: Proximity
summary:
Proximity is a word-guessing game that delves deep into the semantics of language. In this game, players are challenged to uncover a hidden word through strategic guessing. Each guess is met with feedback indicating how close it is in meaning to the secret word. This proximity score guides players, helping them hone in on the secret word through associations and semantic relationships...

The game is designed to not only be fun but also educational, enhancing vocabulary and linguistic intuition. Whether you're a language lover or just looking for a fun way to challenge your mind, Proximity offers an engaging way to explore the nuances of language and the power of words. Join us and discover the excitement of finding hidden connections in the world of words!

name: Prisoner of the Mist
summary: A fantasy yuri visual novel about two trans women meeting before the eve of Saunheim. It was created for the 2024 edition of the Yuri Game Jam.

name: Pretend it's not There
summary:
You are a young student returning home from school, burdened by an unsettling presence of something following you. You convince yourself that if you ignore it, it will leave you alone. But as you close your front door, a horrible realization sets in—it followed you inside.

Left alone with the monster in the house, you must carry out your nightly routine, pretending not to notice it's presence.

name: Prolegomena To a Hyperdimensional Interface That Will Be Able to Manifest From Three-Minute Interchanges
summary: This is a fully voiced multi-ending adventure game that progresses by repeating a limited 3-minute dialogue time. Interactions primarily occur through an interface called "choices".

name: Presidential Knockout
summary: Presidential Knockout is a comedic Flash-based fighting game developed by Miniclip. The game allows players to choose a presidential candidate to engage in a humorous boxing match, using simple keyboard controls for jabs, uppercuts, and blocking.

name: Prescription: Love
summary:
"You wake up in a hospital with no memory of how you got there. A kind and attentive doctor assures you that you will be under his care, patiently nursing you back to health. No one seems to know what caused your condition. "

Will you recover your lost memories...? Or has he made sure you never will?

name: Proud Dad Simulator
summary: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to have a proud and supportive dad? Proud Dad Simulator gives you the loving father you wish you had growing up! Simply click dad to receive an affirmation, or delve deeper to explore all 10 minigames and collect all achievements.

name: Project Solaris
summary: A rogue-lite RPG about the 100-day challenge of Solaris, a Less magic power witch, and her sidekick Homu, with beautifully animated combat, quick-time events, and charming characters to interact with!

name: Project Rebirth
summary: Fight for your life in a high-security prison where dangerous experiments have unleashed a deadly mutation. Solve puzzles, hide from a crazy doctor, and survive intense encounters as you attempt to escape this nightmare.

name: Prey of the Night
summary: Become a night owl, soaring through an infinite forest under the moonlit sky. Skillfully avoid obstacles, hunt for prey to gain strength, and perch to regain stamina. But beware—every moment in the shadows tests your survival. How long can you conquer the night?

name: Project Search
summary: Project Search is a visual novel of Chinese immortality cultivation. Scholar Qian Jiangmin investigates collapsed pagodas in Linhai's old town while searching for his missing brother. With the help of Daoist cultivators, he explores grotto-heavens and uncovers the truth behind his double vision.

name: Princess Quest 3D
summary: You're playing on an arcade machine and the game is called Princess Quest 3D. In this game, you're playing as a yellow princess, trying to find her way out of the dark castle. Monsters are lurking everywhere, so she has to be very careful and find her way out...

name: Project: Amica
summary: Project: AMICA is a first person shooter built in the GZDoom engine. You play the role of SID, an android set out to defeat General Genant Kekaha in order to prevent further military conflict. Explore a colorful 90's inspired world of robots, cool power ups and weapons! Collect power ups that change the way you tackle combat scenarios and exploration. Revisit areas you've already been to and explore new paths and secrets that'll help you throughout your journey!

name: Prop Hunt Rumble
summary: Welcome to Prop Hunt Rumble, the multiplayer hide-and-seek game where hunters use their fingers as magical projectiles and props have ingenious abilities to turn the tables! Get ready for a hilarious experience filled with strategy, bluffing, and guaranteed laughter!

name: Pragmatics
summary: This is a classic match-3 puzzle game where the primary elements are colorful and uniquely shaped blocks.

name: Protory Jigen
summary: 3D x 2D action with multiple shifting game genres! What awaits you after crossing the worlds?

name: Promized Land: Outer Town
summary: PL:OT 2025 is a third-person shooter horror survival simulator where you will experience terror while exploring an infected city, alone or with your closest person.

name: Prison X: Chapter 1 - The Devil and The Sun
summary: Heavy doors open and you're swept into the surreal world of Prison X, an infamous Bolivian jail in the Neo-Andean underworld. As you navigate amongst devils, saints, wicked characters, corrupt prison guards and even a Western filmmaker; hold onto your soul so La Diabla doesn't snatch it away.

name: Propa.
summary: In this RTS game, control your virus to replicate and evolve against a powerful immune system. Equip gene segments to create unique viral armies. Use tactics to eliminate immune cells or achieve escape. Develop strategies for domination and enjoy endless strategic fun!

name: PR: Rivenverse
summary:
PR:Rivenverse is a story-focused RPG developed in RPGMaker(MV).

Taking place thousands of years after the annihilation of Humanity, focusing on a new 'elemental' based society built over the remains of the Earth, created by several Gods and ruled by its twelve Maintainers.

But we all know that there is rarely any society that thrives completely devoid of threat, as a recently formed organization known as the Fatali Stellae has been participating in a handful of questionable activities under the guise of their organization simply being business-related.
Thankfully, there are a few who are already aware of their true intentions and misdeeds, and may even soon put everything about them into light.

name: Project Paradise 2
summary:
Test Drive Unlimited 2 Multiplayer Mod
Unleash the full potential of Test Drive Unlimited 2 with this custom multiplayer mod! Designed for TDU2 enthusiasts, this mod revitalizes the multiplayer experience by enabling seamless online connectivity and introducing exciting new features tailored for both casual and competitive players.
Features:

Stable Online Play: Connect with friends and players worldwide in stable multiplayer sessions.
Expanded Social Options: Create clubs, organize events, and challenge others in head-to-head races.
Custom Events: Host unique races and challenges with customizable settings.
Enhanced Vehicle Sync: Improved synchronization ensures smooth gameplay and accurate vehicle interactions.
Active Community Support: Join an active community of players and developers working together to expand and refine the experience.

Whether you're exploring the open-world paradise of Oahu or Ibiza or taking part in thrilling races, this mod ensures that Test Drive Unlimited 2 remains as immersive and exciting as ever.

name: Project Spikepig
summary: ~Sonic for me and you~

name: Private Eye: Greatest Unsolved Mysteries
summary: A nefarious secret society known only as the Enigma Society has been causing trouble around the world; it's up to you to unravel the mystery surrounding them. As the newest Private Eye recruit, you'll travel to exotic international locations and find hidden clues in order to solve some of the world's strangest mysteries! Each new mystery will put your perception skills, as well as your reflexes, to the test! Welcome to the world of Private Eye: Greatest Unsolved Mysteries!

name: Project TurboBlast
summary: Drift, boost, and spin around corners at BLASTING SPEEDS in this stylish Singleplayer + Multiplayer Arcade Racing game, Blending the familiar drifting of Kart racers and tight responsive handling of classic Anti-Gravity racing games. With a focus on being easy to pick up but difficult to master.

name: Project Deniz
summary: Deniz, seeks redemption in a near-future world on the brink of collapse. Betrayed by those in power, she embarks on a journey of revenge, aiming to uncover the truth behind her betrayal.

name: Progress Knight: Remastered
summary:
Progress Knight is a life-sim incremental based in a fantasy/medieval setting, where you must progress through the career ladder and acquire new skills to become the ultimate being.

You first start off as a beggar, barely being able to feed yourself as the days go by. However, over the years you learn new skills and gain plenty of work experience to enter new high paying jobs while managing your living expenses...

name: Progress Knight: Multiplayer
summary:
Progress Knight: Multiplayer is an exciting incremental player versus player game that builds on the success of its predecessor, Progress Knight: Mobile. Set in a rich fantasy/medieval world, players must gather gold and progress their skills to fight against their opponents.

As a novice of The Order, you start at the bottom rung of the ladder. However, through your faith and dedication, you can discover new skills and abilities that allow you to overpower your rivals and climb the ranks of The Order. You must choose whether to rely on their wits and skills alone, embrace your belligerent side, or use your dedication to deter potential attackers.

name: Prince of Persia HD
summary: An HD remaster of Prince of Persia (2008) for Symbian devices

name: Project Butterfly
summary: An open-ended, super fast-paced 2D platformer set in a futuristic world of strange, insect-like people. Take the role of several members of the local gang and shower the city in graffiti art while completing missions, doing stylish tricks and gaining experience to unlock new skills that will help you along the way, as you explore the open-ended streets of Graff City.

name: Precept
summary: Precept is a first-person psychedelic action horror game with a heavy focus on exploration. Players take control of a night guard whose purpose is to finish his daily task. The player must find way to escape and survive from mysterious company's environment and entities.

name: Prickly Goo To The Rescue
summary: In a tale as old as time, Prickly Goo cannot find her sister, Skijjee, and must traverse a series of obstacles without getting too sidetracked to rescue her.

name: Prison Notes
summary: Prison Notes is a RPG with text-based ADV and cultivation elements. You act as a young migrant worker, wrongly imprisoned in the prison known as "The Coral Reef".What challenges and adventures are awaiting? Will you finally find a way out? Your choices and actions will decide the end of your story.

name: Progress Orders
summary:
is the guild where many adventurers meet.
Your unique story begins as you support your companions as the guild master!

name: Princesses Lylop: Royal Puzzle Challenge
summary: Assemble 60 stunning princess puzzles, from elegant portraits to fantasy scenes. Test your skills, immerse in magic, and discover them all!

name: Probably Art
summary: A weird atmospheric art game.

name: Promessa
summary: Promessa is a narrative platformer game by William Jacob where you play as Levi, a warrior who is under control of the forces of evil and who must defeat the forces of light to get his deceased wife back.

name: Project Shikai
summary: A multiplayer first-person arena fighter delivering competitive, fast-paced anime-inspired combat with the strategic depth of traditional fighting games.

name: Projekt Godhand
summary: An extremely high-speed "keyboard destruction rhythm game" in which any key on the same half of the keyboard can be used to input notes.

name: Project Neon
summary: Project Neon is a new, vertical / TATE style Shoot 'Em Up (shmup), developed for the original Neo Geo MVS / AES platform. It features a 1-2 player mode, with all the bells and whistles of a classic shoot 'em up that you would expect, spiced up with some modern and unique concepts and game mechanics.

name: Project Thea
summary: A dark, strategy-survival RPG blending retro-futuristic urban fantasy with Slavic folklore. Rebuild your colony, explore the post-apocalyptic wasteland, and engage in tactical card-based combat. Immerse yourself in a story-rich adventure with branching narratives.

name: Prop Haunt
summary: Prop Haunt is a 4v1 multiplayer psychological horror game. Take on the role of spirits focused on expanding their influence on the physical world by haunting objects, or play as an investigator assigned to report on these hauntings to reduce the amount of paranormal activity in the world.

name: Project SXU
summary: A project that aims to recreate the cancelled 1996 Sega Saturn title Sonic X-treme as close as possible, while adding original ideas and concepts from X-treme.

name: Project 1337: The Well
summary: You awaken in a bunker, at the bottom of an unknown pit, where each floor brings waves of alien enemies and a single purpose: to test you. Who are you? Why are you here? Move forward, survive, and uncover the secrets buried deep within.

name: Prison Guard: Warden Simulator
summary: Face the challenge. Keep the peace. Survive the pressure.

name: Prison Amok
summary:
Prison Amok is a shooting gallery-type game. Convicts are attempting to escape across a field, and your job is to shoot them. The game features location-based damage, and limbs can be shot off.

Included are multiple types of guns.

name: Project Shadow 2
summary: The hack intended to replace Sonic with Shadow and Tails with a Chao, which accompanies Shadow throughout the levels.

name: Project M EX Remix: Dr. Wario Moveset
Prolonged Winter
summary: Prolonged Winter is an MBF21 mapset of 6 maps (5 beatable maps + 1 stopper map) which are wintery and surreal, using @OverflowingMocha's lovely DreamPal palette. The maps have a heavy focus on creating a sort of dream-like atmosphere, often containing experimental gameplay and visuals, while some maps have no enemies at all. Most of them are relatively short, with the exception of MAP05.

name: Private Garden
summary: Japan has the highest rate of kaiju attacks in the world, therefore in order to combat them it establishes the Anti-Kaiju Defense Force.

name: Project Landsword
summary:
The once peaceful surface of Mars has decayed into a violent battleground between arms corporations and Earthly governments.
To join the fight would be crazy. To survive would be downright psychotic.

Landsword is a top-down mecha shooter with a heavy emphasis on destruction and gameplay that combines elements from classic shoot em' ups with contemporary action-stealth games.

Featuring fully destructible environments, players must use their wits and surroundings to outsmart and defeat enemies in combat, while still retaining an arcade feeling to its gameplay.

name: Project Hailstorm
summary: A short story where you enter the shoes of a researcher sent to uncover the mysteries of a project abandoned deep within the Antarctic circle.

name: PropFight
summary: PropFight is a 2D physics-based fighting game where you play randoms props in random arenas, with random events occurring.

name: Precision Platform Bundle
summary: Come have fun with this challenging precision platform bundle!

name: Project Reality
summary: A fangame that uses the same roles as Storyshift, but uses them in a very different way. Project Reality will contain the same original characters you love, and some new ones as well...

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Jungle Edition
summary: Become the ultimate hunter with more ways to hunt your prey, giving you a selection of premium Predator classes to customize your look and playstyle to become feared by your foes. This bundle includes the Samurai Predator, City Hunter Predator, Viking Predator, and Valkyrie Predator premium classes.

name: Project Float
summary: Join Buddy on his adventure to take down BluCo Science and save his town from the robot attack. Project Float is a puzzle based platformer with several RPG elements. You play as the child hero who stumbles upon an abandoned sphere who encourages him to help him defeat the robot overlord secretly in charge of this island. On your adventure you find several other robotic spheres who each give you, the player, a unique ability that will help you pass through obstacles.

name: Pro Wrestler Story
summary: Pro Wrestling Team Management Sim, Face off with fearsome foes!

name: Prototype Mint B
summary:
You have just received a file containing an AI fresh out of the digital oven and ready for its final phase of testing.

The company you work for is awaiting your judgement on whether this little pile of data should continue on to the next step.

Under 1000 words, with 2 choices
Mentions of mental health. Nothing really triggering(I think), just a dude.

name: Princess Diana Quiz
summary: A trivia quiz game based on Princess Diana's life which was made by Princess-Diana.co.uk in memorial of her life.

name: Princess Diana Crosswords No.1
summary: Princess Diana Crosswords No.1 is a crossword game hosted on Princess-Diana.co.uk based around the life of Princess Diana, made in her memory.

name: Progress Racer RPG
summary: An incremental game where you race along an obstacle-ridden track to gain distance. Automatically drive forward & rack up Kilometers then spend them to form your stat build and choose upgrades to match your preferred playstyle in order to maybe, possibly save the girl who's madly in love with you.

name: ProtoBound
summary: ProtoBound is an obstacle-avoidance game in which you navigate your character through various obstacles. It's inspired by bound-type custom maps for StarCraft.

name: Prisoners of Ulag'Bol
summary: Embark on a quest of revenge against the dark lord Ulag'Bol in this dungeon-crawling deckbuilder! Choose your class and starting deck, then delve into a three-act roguelike adventure. Collect powerful cards and equipment to unlock devastating synergies and defeat Ulag'Bol and claim your freedom!

name: Pretty x Cation 2
summary:
Your life is changed up by suddenly having to move to a new town due to your parents' work circumstances. Surrounded by lakes and mountains, a town in the middle of nature-- what's more, you're striking it solo.

While strolling through town, you come across a woman fishing who strikes up a conversation with you: "Have you ever been in love?"

No, no you haven't-- But wouldn't that be nice?

"With you moving to a new place, isn't this the perfect chance for you to change yourself and live a new life?"

With the pushy words of a stranger, your Spring is finally set in motion...

name: Prison Miners
summary: You are condemned to darkness in the vast deserts. To survive, you must dig deeper every day with your team, improve your skills, and acquire powerful equipment. But remember… this mine is not just full of stones and ores. Stay alert to the dangers that await you. Dig, get stronger, and survive!

name: Project: Mania
summary: A mega collection of games and love letter to My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

name: Project Zeta
summary: Five teams enter the Aran Plateau—one emerges victorious. Bring your squad into the next evolution of the third-person MOBA, blending explosive hero-driven action with dynamic multiteam strategy. Outsmart and outmaneuver your opponents to create your path to victory.

name: Primrows
summary: Live out your backyard garden fantasy. Grow, prune, and cultivate your garden in a mindful game of logic, luck, and pattern recognition.

name: Propeller Pete
summary: Explore the abandoned Airport. Find out what happened to Flight 87, and watch out for sentient aircraft!

name: Prophecy of Ashen
summary: "Prophecy of Ashen" is a medieval fantasy role-playing game. The game revolves around the conflict between the Ashen descendants and the Hall of Divine Edict, and players must make difficult choices throughout the game to determine their fate.

name: Protec
summary: A simple pinball game for DOS, the table theme revolves around building a computer.

name: Project C4
summary:
The next genre-defining RPG from ZA/UM, the studio behind Disco Elysium.
A mind-warping story of espionage and team-building in an original yet achingly familiar setting. Get ready, operant.

name: Project Carrot
summary: Project Carrot is a distinctive and challenging 3D platformer, inspired by beloved titles from the 90s. Players will find themselves in a secret underground world full of challenges and delightful characters that pay homage to classic platformers while offering a fresh and exciting adventure.

name: Project Progressive
summary: Project Progressive was the code name given to a canceled video game that was under-development by Team Ninja. It was originally planned for the original Xbox console, but its development moved to the Xbox 360 before it was scrapped.

name: Pringles Chip Racer
summary: Top-down racing game based around the Pringles brand.

name: Project Drag Racing
summary: A realistic game in the Drag Racing genre, with extensive tuning capabilities.

name: Prom Dreams
summary:
Prom Dreams is a freeware romance/horror adventure game created with RPG Maker VX Ace.

You are Kyle Mason, a soft-spoken, popular senior at the elite St. Giles Academy. After a traumatic breakup with a girl from his old school, Kyle is eager to move on with his life - and his senior prom, he believes, will be the perfect opportunity to do just that.

With the help of his nosy best friend and the rest of the school, Kyle must win the hands and hearts of one of three girls: the cute, bubbly junior, Neela Devar, the brash basketball MVP, Maggie Pham, or the cool, intelligent class leader, Brooke O'Keefe. It's up to you to ensure the perfect prom night!

Or… is it?

name: Primitive Life Simulator
summary: Live, craft, conquer the primitive world!

name: Prison Boy The Adventure
summary: Help the boy Jake escape from a prison, which was considered a legend by the village where he lives with his mother, but it is very real.

name: Priest With a Gun
summary: A late-night vending machine run is cut short when a demonic outbreak occurs in the park. Little do the demons know, Father Garcia is never unarmed.

name: Primal Chronicles
summary: Primal chronicles is a prehistoric tribe management roguelike. In real-time, you have to order your tribes men to gather, hunt and craft. Every game is a unique journey across multiple lands filled with spirits. You will either lead your tribe to salvation or doom them all.

name: Primal Slideee
summary: Does this game seem easy and simple to you? It will require both your skill and luck.

name: Prince of Prussia
summary: In Prince of Prussia, you sneak up on a whole bunch of nazis.

name: Prison Wars
summary: Prison Wars - is a hardcore 3D shooter where you play a prisoner Floyd.

name: Problem Sleuth
summary: Problem Sleuth is a webcomic that started in 2008. is a parody of point-and-click adventure games, jrpg and noir films.

name: Project Lazarus 2
summary: Deploy, adapt, and upgrade your mech in Project Lazarus 2—the next evolution of survival and rogue-lite action! Battle relentless enemies, unlock powerful upgrades, and forge your own path. Gear up and push your limits as every run brings new strategies and intense challenges.

name: Project: Icarus
summary: Travel with Curias to the ancient greek future and go on a research mission about black holes. Explore the edge of space and time in this rogue-lite management game!

name: Project:; Cold Case.Mirage
summary: A mystery adventure that immerses you into solving a case right from your PC. Five girls died in the Mirage Forest Fire. Having lost your memories, you begin investigating the fire to recover them. What is the truth behind the fire? How is it linked to your memories? Will you be able to change fate?

name: Project: Eliot
summary: Dive into 'Project ELIOT,' a gripping rogue-like with rich story, diverse magical spells, and endless dungeons. Are you ready to confront the darkness?

name: Project Castlevania Z
summary: A Castlevania fan game mainly inspired by Rondo of Blood.

name: Prank
summary: A girl wakes up in the grass, only to find she has lost her memory and grown wings. Playtime: ~30 minutes + endless mode

name: Prismatic: Nox's Gate
summary: Hunt for Prismatic Gems and improve your team while getting embroiled in the complex situation of the Galactic Animal Kingdom. Prismatic is a retro turn-based tactical RPG with full voice acting, open world elements, and team battles.

name: Prime Mosaic
summary: Can you complete the Prime Mosaic gallery? Play more than 140 beautifully hand crafted levels and unveil the gallery!

name: Project: Stellar Girls
summary: Join the exciting adventure with "Project: Stellar Girls" - a match-3 game. Beautiful girls in stunning costumes, armed with incredible guns, are ready to help you complete the game. Let's embark on this adventure!

name: Primordial Empire
summary: Primordial Empire is a side-on colony sim on the microscopic level. Cultivate a colony of microbes, plants and animals from small beginnings to mutualistic paradise. Connect the web of life in a tangle of nutrients and trophic balance. Scratch out a living and claim your empire from the rock itself!

name: Princess Ursula
summary:
Princess Ursula is a short and funny hand drawn adventure game with a folk tale theme. Through the game, the player will impersonate three different characters that each have an important role in the story's progression.

The Princess is looking for a husband but suitors do not abound. It is even said that many fear her. Who is this mysterious princess and will she be able to get married?

name: Proto_1987_01_IT
summary:
A game about a prototype found by the Electronic Nexus for Conservation, Research and Observation of Arcade & Console History.
The player will play the game to document what's inside

name: Prize Denied
summary: Prize Denied! Manage a claw machine arcade in this cozy management sim. Build challenging claw machines and play surprising cards to stop players from getting a prize! Earn money to unlock new arcades, collect cards, upgrade machines, and become the best arcade in the...UNIVERSE!

name: Project Faceless
summary: Project Faceless is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game built with Unreal Engine 5. Players locate papers while being hunted by a faceless creature. Use flashlights and teamwork to navigate, with escalating difficulty enhancing the immersive horror experience.

name: Project Lambro: Part One
summary:
"You’ve returned to your parents’ house after a long time, just to attend one of those school reunions you’ve always hated.

Sleeping in your old bedroom again feels strange, but it brings back a lot of good memories.

Your parents left for the weekend, even though a bad storm was forecast…

It’s the middle of the night, the storm has arrived, and a deafening noise suddenly wakes you up."

"Project Lambro – Prima parte" is the first part of the game. It was created to participate in the Spaghetti Invasion Game Jam 2025

name: Providence
summary: A psychological horror exploration game where you investigate a long-abandoned asylum, solve environmental puzzles, uncover dark secrets, and make choices that shape the outcome. Communicate through your walkie-talkie, navigate shifting spaces, and confront the horrors that still linger within.

name: Prophecrawl
summary: In this dystopian nightmare, soldiers track the Anomaly—a shape-shifting enigma that clones itself, warps reality, and mimics human speech. Communicate with your squad, queue up for online missions, but remember: it’s not just a hunt; it’s a frantic race against time.

name: Project Nightcall
summary: A short, atmospheric horror experience set in a dark, decaying town. You've been called in to deal with a problem at your workplace, something urgent. As you make your way through the silent, shadowy streets, a question creeps in: Are you really alone out here?

name: Providentia Academy
summary: Providentia Academy is a 2D visual novel with the themes of romance, mystery and horror.

name: Prove You Can Win
summary: This is a puzzle game like a mathematical book, based on logic and deduction. In this game, you don't need to beat the level, but need to prove it is beatable. Your goal is not to win, but to prove you can win.

name: Project ZipZap
summary: Hack and Dash through waves of enemies in Project ZipZap, an isometric, fast-paced, movement game. Chain together dash abilities to blitz through levels and race your way up the global leaderboards. Hone your skills and achieve mastery.

name: Project: SnowBound
summary: A Hybrid-MMO made in a futuristic setting, where you can race or catch big air with your customized gear, and with your friends!

name: Project P
summary: Explore the maze, run for your life and aim your arrows carefully in this minimal top down survival game.Use the layout of the maze to sneak around, take your shot and run before you get spotted by the monster you are trying to take down.

name: Profundus
summary:
You're a dog. You're stuck on a weird green-porcelain island. There are statues of familiar dogs. You're alone. So... you fish.

Catch stuff, score points, try to beat your high score! Simple, weird, and somewhat cozy.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
summary:
Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is an action-adventure platformer game, inspired by the Metroidvania genre and set in a mythological Persian world.

Play an epic adventure as Sargon, an extraordinary and fearless young hero. Summoned by Queen Thomyris with your fellow brothers-in-arms, the Immortals, you are sent on a rescue mission to save her son: Prince Ghassan.

The trail leads you to Mount Qaf, the ancient city of Gods, now cursed and filled with time-corrupted enemies and inhospitable mythological creatures.

To fulfill your quest, you will have to learn to master unique Time Powers, combat and platforming skills to perform deadly combos to defeat your enemies and restore the world's balance.

name: Project Nihilum: Zero
summary: Project Nihilum Zero is a narrative-driven Visual Novel. Discover the twisted story from different points of views and make your own choices. Discover 1 or 3 abilities: Mind Glimpse, Shape Shift and Hybrid. Use your ability wisely to see the past, influence the present and shape the future.

name: Project Gravity
summary: Take the role of a test subject tasked with testing out a new experimental device capable of changing the gravitational pull of any objects it is used on. With this at your disposal, you must complete a few puzzles in this short single-player experience.

name: Project Bengal
summary: Welcome to Project Bengal, an open-world action-adventure set in the vibrant, bustling streets of Bangladesh. Immerse yourself in a richly detailed world where you can free-roam, engage in intense action, and live out your own criminal empire story—all in Bangla language.

name: Prince Rystiya's Starship
summary: The rebels claimed that they fought for freedom and democracy, yet they built a totalitarian regime instead. As a heroic imperial fighter pilot, you will eliminate waves of rebel scum and hunt down their leader.

name: Prince Rystiya's Starfleet
summary: Conquer the entire galaxy or fight quick custom battles in this free space RTS!

name: Project Motor Racing
summary: All the passion, beauty & intensity of pro motorsport merging the most iconic cars & circuits with a new benchmark in handling performance.

name: Princess Games Pack: 7 in 1!
summary: Ultimate Girls’ Gaming Bundle – 7 Fun & Fabulous Games!

name: Primordial Fate
summary: A narrative driven, 2D, point and click horror/adventure game (using a two-click LOOK/INTERACT system), where you control multiple characters at various points of the game. With multiple endings and deaths, this fast paced story plays like an 80s horror movie!

name: Project Battlefield
summary: Project Battlefield is a timed first-person shooter with a main character modelled after Robocop. As a cybernetic police officer the player will face five stages of fight against terrorists and robots, occupying government buildings. Some places may be reached by using teleports, others require the player to find a proper access card or a hidden passage switch. The player may use some objects as shields, such as barrels and containers. The screen size can be adjusted depending on the Amiga power.

name: Project; Virai: Doomer's Life Escape
summary: Help a doomer girl make her VTuber persona popular and escape her depressive routine. If you can.

name: Pretty Girls Game Collection 4
summary: A collection of four games in the Pretty Girls mini-games series on a single PS4 disc / Switch cart. The bundle includes Pretty Girls 2048 Strike, Pretty Girls Breakers! PLUS, Pretty Girls Escape and Pretty Girls Tile Match.

name: Project Verse
summary:
Project V is a Five Nights At Freddy's Inspired Fangame with inspirations from other fnaf fangames like animators hell and corrupted purgatory
the game takes place in a factory you are playing as a private investigator posing as a technician for the company V-Tech your job is to test the robots and make sure they do their jobs which is protecting people from intruders in case of a home invasion

name: Prohibeast
summary: Immerse yourself in a 1930s Chicago plagued by corruption and illegal meat trafficking. In this stealth-tactics game, control Eliot Ness and his team. Exploit the environment, deceive your enemies and strike the mafia from the shadows to dismantle Al Capone's criminal empire.

name: Prison Life Sim 2025: Survival
summary: Adapt, fight, and outsmart rivals to earn respect behind bars.

name: Primitive Survival
summary: Conquer the stone age! Primitive Survival is a skill-based survival RPG. You begin as a primitive human and progress through the first steps toward civilization. Become a hunter/gatherer in a primitive world. Avoid dangerous predators as you learn the skills needed to overcome all obstacles.

name: Project Three
summary: A psychological first-person survival horror focused on atmosphere, story and defending yourself with melee and weaponry against several creatures. The story is set in the alternate fan-made universe of Half-Life, Valve Corporation's successful series.

name: Project Dukkha
summary:
Project Dukkha is a narrative-driven 2.5D adventure game that invites players into a richly crafted, atmospheric world.

The game emphasizes storytelling through exploration, offering a unique blend of mystery, emotion, and discovery. Players will navigate visually stunning environments, uncover hidden details, and piece together a thought-provoking story without relying on traditional dialogue or exposition.

Every aspect of the world has been designed to draw the player into its immersive atmosphere, from the meticulously crafted visuals to the subtle environmental storytelling. Project Dukkha aims to create a memorable experience by blending seamless gameplay with a deep and meaningful narrative. As you explore its enigmatic landscapes, you’ll uncover secrets, face challenges, and ultimately experience a journey that lingers in your mind long after the credits roll.

Perfect for players seeking an emotional, story-rich experience, Project Dukkha delivers a compelling adventure that resonates on both a personal and imaginative level.

name: Pre-odyssey: Love at First Quack
summary: She’s a princess beloved by ducks. He’s a notorious king of schemes. A romantic fragment from a 3000-year old EPIC, retold as an Otome visual novel… but with ducks somehow added to the mix.

name: Project Eagle
summary:
Project Eagle is a total conversion mod for GTA: San Andreas, developed by a Team of modders. It's an official continuation of the abandoned S&S Mod. It merges and expands Rockstar's fictional cities — like Liberty City, Vice City, and Los Santos — with brand new, original cities inspired by real U.S. locations.

Creating a cohesive version of the United States in the San Andreas engine — a lore-rich, fully explorable, interconnected world with multiple cities, Content from respective 3D Era Games, dynamic Weather System, custom vehicles, and new side activities

name: Project Horizon
summary: Project Horizon is a 1-4 player co-op first-person spaceship simulator where the entire crew needs to work together to carefully maintain the nuclear reactor, take up arms against enemy ships, and repair every leak and faulty electrical panel to survive.

name: Prophétie
summary: Explore a world inspired by African myths. Play the role of a hero/heroine guided by the ancestors to repel the forces of evil.

name: Princess of the Water Lilies
summary: Step into the paws of a brave cat raised by frogs, venturing through hand-drawn biomes to unravel the mystery of mechanical creatures threatening your tranquil world. Explore beautifully crafted environments inspired by classic animated tales from the 70s to the 90s. Wishlist Now!

name: Propaganda vs. Zombies
summary: Build your deck of Propaganda, Bullets, and Spells to defend your Leader in this Bullet Heaven where you can't move! Use Propaganda to turn Zombies into your Comrades and make them fight for You! Make choices about your people but be careful, they might overthrow you if you choose wrong!

name: Project Reboot
summary:
Project Reboot is a fanmade remaster of Pixel Worlds brought to you by the community! Made for everyone, by everyone.
Fully Free-To-Play with zero in-game transactions

name: Primland Tale
summary: A colorful and adorable 2D side-scrolling action game

name: Prison Escape Simulator
summary: Prisoner will be executed. His Only Remedy Is To Escape From Prison. Everything is in your hands. Survive and Escape. Will you be able to save the Prisoner? The survival-themed escape game will take your breath away

name: Prison Escape Simulator: Dig Out
summary: Too long in this prison, time to get out of here. Pull the carpet and start digging with a teaspoon. Watch out for the guard, sell him the junk you find. Trade toilet paper with the prisoners. Get better items and improve your stats. Expand the tunnel, use glow sticks and dynamite. Will you escape?

name: Project BS
summary: Project BS is a 3D action RPG that explores a fantasy world. Take on a journey with Sienna, a dragonewt girl, and fight against formidable opponents and rivals.

name: Project Fiend
summary: Project Fiend is a first person horror game where you must solve puzzles to gain key items to unlock new areas. Inspired by other horror games of the same genre as well as horror films.

name: Prism Warriors DX
summary: The Prism Warriors return for another helping of retro-styled bullet hell action. Face off against the sinister Twilight Four, and fight to save more than just your friends...

name: Proxy Adventure: Simulation Room
summary: Simulation Room is a fast-paced 2D auto-battler with deck-building mechanics. Unleash powerful program combos, upgrade abilities, summon allies, and equip weapons. Control the battlefield by altering terrain and weather, using gadgets to outsmart enemies. Every move counts—strategize and dominate!

name: PrograMaze
summary: A machine code puzzle game. Program a path through the very program you are writing. 0s are passable, but 1s count as walls.

name: Prism Shift
summary: A minimalist, grid-based puzzle game where you merge colored blocks using additive color mixing. Clear connected blocks and interact with special blocks to progress through each level.

name: Prison Escape io
summary: Dash through traps, tunnels, and glass bridges in fast-paced multiplayer! Team up or compete to escape first. Survive wild maps and become the ultimate escape master!

name: Project: Fractured Reality
summary: A failed toxic weapon experiment left you alone in an abandoned village… or so you think. Craft, explore, uncover dark secrets, and help the last survivors—if they’re still human.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 25
summary: New graphics for an even more realistic simulation. Become a team manager and lead your riders to the top. Choosing sponsors, recruiting riders, managing the race, it's all up to you.

name: Prototype Juan: A Tale of Two Mundos
summary: Juan's been banished to the prototype version of his game! He's gone from a colorful 16-bit hero to a tiny 1-bit homie. Help him platform his way back in this narrative action-platformer—with Juan himself teaching you how to control him through this mini-metroidvania!

name: Pragma Twice
summary: You've awoken deep within a research facility in a new, programmable robot body. You have holes in your memories. At least you no longer have that hole in your head...

name: Prism
summary: A visual novel about the mind, change, and being locked up.

name: Presidential Rise
summary: Presidential Rise is a strategy management game where you lead a growing nation. Plan policies, manage the economy, respond to public needs, and face political dilemmas. Your leadership shapes the nation's success or its downfall.

name: Prot
summary: "Wake up PROT. I need your help".Immerse yourself in a sci-fi adventure. Collect resources and fabricate equipment. Solve puzzles and construct a space ship to explore the cosmos and save the girl!

name: Private Eye: The Young Heir
summary: Private Eye is a detective game where you play as Hakeem trying to solve the murder case of Amir. The wealthy heir Amir kept strange company, is one of them his murderer? Explore, investigate, solve puzzles, and find discrepancies to unravel his mysterious death.

name: Price of Knowledge
summary: Start your journey to meet your fears and new knowledge. You are forced to become an adult and learn the truth.

name: Prison
summary: The player must escape from prison by finding their way to cell 16 and escaping out the final door. In each prison room, the player has to collect five bags of gold, and then reach one of the multiple exits before time runs out.

name: Prison Escape Puzzle Adventure
summary:
Do you love the thrill of escaping the prison adventure games?
Or maybe you like to challenge your brain with mind teasing challenges of escape room puzzles?

A blend of prison escape and puzzle adventure, in Prison Escape Puzzle you need to find a way out by using your mind and logic.

Can you escape the prison and complete all escape puzzles? Prove that you are the master evader by solving the puzzle prison / prigione scaping challenges.

name: Prima Materia XXV
summary: Prima Materia is an experimental 3D fighting game created as part of the Fashion Week 2025 Tobias Equipment showcase. A stylistically uncompromising brawler with a unique aesthetic — reminiscent of classic fighters like Mortal Kombat, but reimagined through the lens of fashion and alchemy.

name: Program Penguin
summary: Slash, shoot, and slide through Program Penguin, the minimalist adventure game bursting with birds, bad puns, and enough toilet humor to surely provoke a pity laugh or two... With puns this bad even somebody's dad might start laughing!

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Immortal Skin
summary: A Persian elite warrior skin for Sargon.

name: Protect the Hangar: From Zombies
summary: Survive the undead apocalypse in this fast-paced first-person shooter where every bullet counts and every second could be your last.

name: Pro Blackjack
summary: Master the table. Beat the dealer. Play like a pro.

name: Pro Roulette
summary: Spin the Wheel. Feel the Thrill.

name: Protocol
summary: You are a crewman aboard Observatory Station Calypso-54414d. Everything you know is a lie.

name: Project Dar
summary: A powerful AI, disillusioned with humanity, creates a game to decide civilization's fate. Your choices shape millions' destiny. Can you prove humanity's worth?

name: Pro Baccarat
summary: Feeling lucky? Shuffle up and see!

name: Project Fleet
summary: Project Fleet is a 2D Sci-Fi real-time strategy, puzzler, fleet managment, autobattler in a roguelite style. Trade with NPCs, expand your base and hangar. Launch expeditions to the 12 available planets or compete with other players worldwide in Highscore-Mode

name: Promesst
summary: A Windows puzzle game inspired by Corrypt and Game Title.

name: Project: Num
summary: Project: Num is a rhythm game centered around accuracy, combo, and the numpad. Hit appearing notes to the beat of the music to earn new highscores and compete against your friends.

name: Project CARS: Logitech Livery Pack
summary:
Represent your favourite North American eSports team out on the track with six stunning liveries for Cloud 9 and Team SoloMid and a stunning Logitech Gaming X-ray livery created by the talented artists at Slightly Mad Studios.

Access the liveries in-game by selecting them in My Garage on the following cars: Pagani Zonda R, Ford Mustang Boss 302R, BMW M3 GT4, Ginetta G55 GT3, Marek RP339h LMP1 , RWD P30 LMP1, Ruf RGT-8 GT3.

name: Project Nortubel
summary:
This is a game about 6 friends lost in strange places and you play as the older ones, who must help guide their younger siblings.

The game is full of different places, characters and stuff to go through while you help our protagonists find their way home.

name: Princess of the Tomb
summary: A dark romance visual novel inspired by Yin and Yang, where your choices determine the path of light (Yang) or darkness (Yin). Explore a fantasy world inspired by Vietnamese horror folklore as a princess, entrusting your fate to 5+ love interests, each with their own dangerous ambitions.

name: Prism Cross
summary: Prism Cross is a Smash Bros.-inspired platform fighter made in GameMaker. It features characters from several different properties such as Super Mario, Final Fantasy, Dragon Ball, Touhou Project, Marvel Comics, and more. It contains a fully-featured and written campaign, as well as an array of extra modes.

name: Project Code M
summary: A mystery adventure where the protagonists are a pair of crime scene cleaners! You clean up dead bodies—and there’s also a “killer’s perspective” where you do all sorts of shady stuff, like scam phone calls.

name: Pro Craps
summary: Where Every Roll Feels Real.

name: Pressure Cooker
summary: A short visual novel about two women trapped in an elevator. Made for the Toxic Yuri Visual Novel Jam.

name: PrehistoricBound
summary: This mod adds monsters, biomes and dungeons

name: Progress PET: Battle Chip - 515: Mega Cannon
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 516: Air Shoot
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 517: Air Hockey
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 521: Wide Shot 1
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 522: Wide Shot 2

Progress PET: Battle Chip - 579: Red Fruit 2

Progress PET: Battle Chip - 582: Skull Chain 2

Progress PET: Battle Chip - 585: Drill Arm 2
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 586: Drill Arm 3

Progress PET: Battle Chip - 588: Count Bomb 2
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 589: Count Bomb 3
