Progress PET: Battle Chip - 591: Inazuma King 2
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 592: Inazuma King 3
Progress PET: Battle Chip - 593: Bamboo Lance
Prop Sumo
summary: Prop Sumo is a physics-driven fighting game that pits ordinary props together in extraordinary battles!

name: Princes of Darkness
summary: Dark Ages just got a whole lot darker. Play Crusader Kings III as a vampire, hunter, werewolf, changeling, mummy or demon! You are the Prince of the city! Inspired by the World of Darkness, Dark Ages: Vampire, Vampire: the Masquerade...

name: Project Warfield Heroes
summary: Warfield Heroes Project is an independent online game inspired by Battlefield Heroes.

name: Pro Virtual Racing
summary: Real cars. Real physics. Unreal thrill.

name: Project B-Fer: Prime Cut
summary:
You and 4 other people are trapped underground on a moving subway train. What are you willing to do to get out? Will you play by the rules, or break them?

An escape room style visual novel with non conventional puzzles, colorful characters, and a rich story.

name: Project Epoch
summary:
Project Epoch is a Classic+ server in active development for over a year, built with a singular goal: to bring you back to the world you love—enhanced with high-quality, thematic, and immersive content carefully woven into a Blizzlike foundation. Running on the Wrath of the Lich King 3.3.5 client, Project Epoch has been extensively modified to recapture the feel of Classic WoW, all while opening the door to new possibilities grounded in rich Warcraft lore.

On September 9, developers announced on Discord that Blizzard sent a cease-and-desist letter. The team complied immediately.

name: Project 7: Escape Room
summary: An escape room inspired adventure. Play as an investigator exploring the mysterious disappearance of a physicist involved in a secretive experiment known as Project 7. Explore the mansion, observe carefully, and use your puzzle-solving skills to uncover the truth behind Dr. Hillman's vanishing.

name: Prophet
summary: You are a Pilgrim nearing to the end of your Pilgrimage, committed to the final steps of the ritual with the Great Prophet. Your choices will judge what happens to you and the future of the church.

name: Prop Pack
summary: Introducing Prop Pack: the furniture catalog of the future! New furniture sets, gardening additions, pets, building blocks, and even household decorations, can now all be yours at the touch of a button! Prop Packaging delivers only the finest!

name: Pritto Prisoner
summary: Get ready for chaotic 4v2 party game action in Pritto Prisoner! Play as mischievous animal inmates using strategically messy peepee/poopie tactics to outwit highly customizable robot wardens. Break out, or get put to "deep sleep" in this asymmetrical escape game. Easy to learn, hilarious to master.

name: Project Decay: Bodycam FPS
summary: Project DECAY is a Bodycam PVE and PVP FPS in CQB environments

name: Project Kouvola
summary: A visual novel about a dystopian country and the things survivors must do to stay alive... The happiest country in the world is now in ruins and only a few remain alive. This couldn't get any worse...

name: Project S
summary: "Project S" by Lionheart Studio is an upcoming looter shooter for console and PC with a post-apocalyptic theme.

name: Price of a Life
summary: Price of a Life blends intense bullet-hell action with strategic micromanagement. Survive deadly trials, control multiple elements, and navigate chaos to win the favor of the enigmatic deity, Sacrion.

name: Prism
summary: Enjoy 100 mind-bending levels in this light-based puzzler. Use your mouse to point, click and scroll to use mysterious tools to reflect, bend, filter, separate, mix, split, unblock, teleport, and polarize light to reach the goals.

name: Protest Simulator
summary: Choose your side in the tense streets; resist as a protester or intervene as a police officer. Build barricades, throw stones, restore order. Order or freedom the choice is yours.

name: Project Lab
summary: A horror game in which you are an employee of a secret laboratory.

name: Presidential Social Media Manager
summary: Welcome to the most stressful job in politics making the President look sane online. Fix typos, fight trolls, and spin chaos into strategy. One wrong emoji could spark a crisis. A satirical management game where timing and damage control are your only lifelines.

name: Price of Glory
summary:
Welcome to Price of Glory

Price of Glory is a competitive multiplayer 2D turn-based mobile strategy game with a rich medieval fantasy world.

A balanced zero-randomness game core ensures the only thing that matters is your skill, and asynchronous turns allow you to execute masterful strategy whenever you have a spare moment.

Hone your skills in quick skirmishes, then dive into competitive tournaments for the chance to win real money!

name: Project Fallback
summary: It is a 2D pixel-based shooting game, where you are a robot sent from Earth to capture spaceships and satellites from enemy control and bring them back under our control. You are humanity’s last hope. The story takes place in the far future. Play the game and experience yourself.

name: Project Origin
summary: Project Origin is an immersive MMORPG set in a fractured world where players explore, battle, and shape their own journey. Engage in dynamic combat, uncover hidden lore, and traverse a vast, evolving landscape filled with challenges and secrets waiting to be discovered.

name: Project Voxel Miami
summary: A multiplayer action shooter voxel style game

name: Principal Panic
summary: Principal Panic is a multiplayer school party game filled with chaotic humor. Each round, one player becomes the principal, while the others try to create chaos by completing mischievous tasks, dancing, and managing energy. Distinguish real students from bots and survive.

name: Project:M
summary: Indie Horror puzzle game

name: Presidential Beatdown
summary: The Ultimate Political Party-Crasher! Presidential Beatdown is a silly local/couch 2-D multiplayer fighting game in which super-soldier Presidents battle it out for political dominance.

name: Project Octavia
summary: A stylized third-person spy action game with infiltration, gunplay, Close Quarter Combat (CQC) and innovative and dynamic sabotage gadget crafting with brand new science-fiction based stealth action multiplayer gameplay!

name: Processor Tycoon
summary:
Processor Tycoon is a business simulation game where you start your own hardware company and compete with other companies in the emerging industry of semiconductors.

The game starts in 1975 and goes until 2030. You can develop CPUs, research new technologies, and expand your factories.

name: Prescribe and Pray
summary: Who said being a doctor was an easy job? In Prescribe and Pray, you're the Doctor! Check the patient's identity, diagnose their (often bizarre) illness, and issue their prescription. All without making a mistake! So, are you up to the challenge?

name: Project Spectrum
summary: Project Spectrum is a new horror-infused first-person shooter from the team behind Delta Force.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds: Oni Predator
summary: As a Yautja specializing in stealth, the Oni Predator dedicates all his resources to improving the technology, allowing him to engage his prey from the shadows. He is a warrior who prioritized speed and ranged combat, making him an extremely formidable foe.

name: Project Rot
summary: Players will interact with their environment, talk to unique characters, and battle in real-time against their own emotions. Dive into the mind of a younger Nicole as she battles to situate herself in the Other-World whilst learning to cope with the separation from her Mom.

name: Princess Trouble
summary: Princess Trouble is a 2D pixel platformer featuring unique movement mechanics and key-finding challenges. Explore a mystical castle, solve puzzles, and navigate traps to find your way back to the living world.

name: Proxyma
summary: Proxyma is a hardcore retro-style 2D platformer that challenges you to finish 13 increasingly hard levels in a single run.

name: Project ReMind
summary: "Welcome to the end. My end" Manipulate machinery, open secret passages and bypass computers to remember your life, from your first discovery to your own death bed. In this first-person narrative puzzle game investigate a mysterious presence looking for the answer that haunted you since THAT day.

name: Prison Boss: Prohibition - Plucked Pack
summary:
Feathers? Who needs 'em.
The Plucked Pack is raw, unapologetic confidence. It’s for those who’ve seen too much, lost it all in the shower room, and came out shinier — and weirder — than ever.

With this pack you'll get access to:
• Featherless Skin: Pale, patchy, and proud. Nothing to hide, nowhere to hide it.
• Shower Towel Hat: A stylish wrap for eggs who just got out… or just gave up.
• Toothbrush: Just a toothbrush. Totally normal. Definitely not suspicious. Don’t ask.

Warning: May cause increased breeze sensitivity and awkward stares in the yard.

name: Project Agent
summary: Be the main actor in this suspenseful interactive spy thriller as you seek to escape your captors from their secret base. You are a secret agent, of the type that usually excels during every mission, through bravery and intelligence, not to mention your pretty good looks. But alas, your last mission ended in peril, for you were captured and must now attempt a daring escape!

name: Prism Song
summary: Prism Song is a boss-rush fantasy platformer with unique ASCII art and non-linear gameplay. Set in a strange and dying world, take the form of 3 powerful Avatars to serve the Prism! Use special moves to take down the King, the Queen, and the Dragon, and restore the Song! Will you spare them?

name: Prince of Persia: Escape 2
summary:
It is time for a new action-packed mobile Prince of Persia adventure!

Perform death-defying jumps, avoid challenging obstacles, slay your enemies, and defeat gigantic bosses as the Prince of Persia in this energetic endless runner.

name: Professor Pemda's Puzzle Pyramid
summary: A block-pushing math game. Destroy all antimatter and antiantimatter, then reach the escape pod.

name: Project SkyShard
summary:
Build your island kingdom and battle other wizards in a war for the throne! A PvP auto battler taking inspiration from city builders and puzzle games.

Your island starts empty, and as you progress through the game you can spend your Mana resource to travel to distant skyshards for resources. Build up your little kingdom and fight other players with asynchronous PVP matchmaking. Can you figure out which units combine best together, and how to manage the space on your little skyshard?

name: Prism
summary: A mish-mash of a maze and a platformer within both 2D and 3D!

name: Project Kepler: Delivery Included!
summary: Project Kepler: Delivery Included! is a roguelike base-defense game where players control a lone cyborg stranded on a hostile planet. The objective is to survive waves of evolving alien creatures while managing resources, constructing automated defenses, and deploying drones for combat and support. Key features include procedurally generated runs, upgradeable drones and turrets, automation systems, daily randomized upgrades, and an ultimate fail-safe: an orbital strike to eradicate the planet.

name: Prehistoric Skater
summary: In a 2D Side scrolling adventure, you are a fearless caveman riding through the untamed jungle on your trusty skateboard. As you speed through the wild terrain, be on the lookout for dangerous snakes, venomous spiders, and other hazardous obstacles.

name: Proxima Divide
summary: A first-person sci-fi survival game where you explore a mysterious alien planet, manage oxygen and resources, craft tools, and uncover the secrets of a lost research colony.

name: Project MT
summary: Survive endless waves in this fast-paced 2D space shooter. Upgrade your ship between 20-second battles, adapt to enemy behaviors, and climb the global leaderboard. Strategic, intense, and built for replayability.

name: Protocol Aegirum
summary: A turn-based tactical game in the style of chess, with roguelike elements, where you command a fleet in dynamic strategic battles to break humanity's cycle of defeat.

name: Project Manager: Initiation
summary: A strategic game that simulates the work of a Project Manager within a large corporation. From a first-person perspective, you gain the skills and tools essential for PM work during the first stage of a project: Initiation.

name: Project Smile
summary: Uncover the dark secrets of The Haven Institution in this psychological horror adventure. Under Dr. Evelyn Vane’s rule, patients endure twisted experiments in pursuit of “perfection.” Escape is uncertain. Compliance is expected. Eventually, you will find your smile too.

name: Project Evilbane
summary: Project Evilbane is a dynamic and action-packed strategy-based experience that you can tackle solo or with friends. Switch freely between ranged and melee weapons, and customize your skills for every situation to create your own unique warrior. Your choices and teamwork will determine your victory!

name: Project Freefall
summary: Grab your squad and dive into a frantic chase for the lone parachute as you play the ultimate game of tag at 10,000 feet! Toss a grenade, spray a fire extinguisher, or dodge the shark as you skydive with your friends and try to survive the fall. Will you go on to victory or go splat? Free to play.

name: ProcW
summary: ProcW is a 2D Top Down Local Multiplayer shooter, with up to four players.

name: Project Maze
summary: A short, psychological horror experience set in a maze. You need to find pieces to the puzzle which will hopefully lead to escape.

name: Prison Out
summary: Prison Out is a game that uses 3D action and a physics engine to help you escape from a prison. It's up to you to use the powers you gain from the demon to escape from prison and defeat it in order to be restored to your original form, or to just run away.

name: Project: Haste
summary: Project: Haste is a first-person multiplayer parkour arena shooter on skates, where skill, style, and speed reign supreme. After hours, skaters hijack civil spaces using 2000s-inspired tech to wall run, double jump, and power slide through newly created chaos playgrounds.

name: Primordium: Eclipse
summary: “The fate of this world rests on a girl’s decision.” From the mysterious Remnant Room emerges another realm, ruled by the Zaihaku (Glitch)—once human, now twisted into monsters by their sins. Strengthen your power to forge weapons at will, surpass your limits, and fight to reclaim your world.

name: Project Pandanda
summary:
Project Pandanda is a free recreation of the popular Red Panda massively multiplayer online game you remember and love. It came out in the May of 2024, having a big playerbase of more than 2k users! Relive nostalgic moments, enjoy regular updates, join fun community events, and connect with fellow players!

Re-experience Pandanda with custom festivals, items, features, NPCs, events & much more!

name: Proxy Project Ouroboros
summary: A 3D local splitscreen reimagining of the snake game (can be played single player too), as an infinite wave based score attack where you have to eat different rogue critters who's AI changes depending on the current level event in the chosen map, with deep customization in both looks and gameplay.

name: Project Cobalt
summary: ️ Project Cobalt is a survival action game set on a hostile island . Scavenge containers, mine resources, craft tools, hunt animals, and endure storms as you fight hunger, disease, and exhaustion all while uncovering the dark truth behind a failed experiment.

name: Project DeepWeb: Eternal Nightmare
summary: Project DeepWeb: Eternal Nightmare is a deep web exploration adventure — a standalone spinoff of Project DeepWeb. Inspired by Internet lore and subconscious fears, this game tells a story based on a deep and forgotten folklore. The Show’s over. Time to wake up.

name: Presidential Psychologist
summary: You're not a real psychologist. He's not a sane president. Welcome to the most unhinged therapy session ever held in office.

name: Pretty Peculiar Lovers
summary: Pretty Peculiar Lovers is a visual novel dating sim with a compelling twist, where your decisions impact which romance candidate you engage with, and what secrets you may uncover about them. Come prepared, these seemingly kind and welcoming individuals may not be how they appear.

name: Probably Nothing
summary: In Probably Nothing, you're just an ordinary streamer who's been whisked away from their gaming setup to... somewhere else entirely! As you explore this strange new world, discover that your home has been replaced by a wacky labrynth filled with cryptic clues and hidden passages.

name: Princess's Peak
summary: This is a puzzle game that incorporates guessing to get characters and interact with the characters. According to the remaining number of cards in the upper left corner, guess the card that your opponent will play and beat them to get the character tokens. Once all the tokens are obtained, the character will be unlocked. The difficulty will increase as the game progresses.

name: Private Detective, Freeze
summary: In 'Private Detective, Freeze,' set in futuristic Korea, you play as Freeze, an amateur detective, solving the murder of Hwang Jong-ha. Explore six rooms, gather clues, and unravel the connections between suspects and victim to uncover the truth.

name: Project Dreamscape
summary: Journey through a surreal dreamscape in this hack-and-slash roguelite, expanding your dream one land at a time. Wield a shape-shifting hammer in fast-paced combat, battling waves of Dreamons. Unlock powerful Aspects, gain new abilities, and forge an ever-growing dreamworld in this vibrant adventure

name: Pro Player Life
summary: In Pro Player Life you can make your dream of becoming a pro player come true, and maybe even become a legend in the world of e-sports. Manage your career, level up your skills, and come up against increasingly stronger opponents in your journey to the top of the world.

name: Project Mercenaria
summary: Project Mercenaria is a third-person shooter game featuring beautiful girls. You will play as a mercenary girl, engaging in thrilling gun battles with a mysterious and evil organization on a distant island, experiencing the ups and downs of the mercenary life.

name: Practical Pinball
summary: This game is a simple pinball game to show off the game development knowlegde this developer possesses at this time. It features simple drawn characters and fun boards with all kinds of different themes for players to enjoy.

name: Princess Covenant
summary: In this hand-drawn pixel-art card-battler game, you’ll gather powerful allies, upgrade their vocations, and lead them into battle beside Princess and her mouse guardian Arlo against the cursed Forsakens who threaten the kingdom.

name: Prosrochennyy
summary: A visual novel game about dissociation, eating disorders and abandonment. You experience life through fragmented thoughts, simulating the inner voice of someone disconnected from reality. A text-based story of presence and absence.

name: Prop Hunt 2.0
summary: Prop Hunt 2.0 is a game where you have to become an prop or a hunter. An exciting game for a company of friends and new acquaintances.

name: Project R2
summary: Build, fight and destroy. Command a squads of customizable combat robots in strategic battles across diverse environments.

name: Prisonela MD
summary: Get ready for platforming incarceration insanity in this new Megadrive game, Prisonela MD. These levels may be short, but fun!

name: Protocol Nadir
summary: A first person Horror game containing multiple enemies in a complex series of randomly generated rooms. Fight them and ascend to the truth. Find what awaited others before you. Uncover the mystery and explore the truth.

name: Prime World: Classic
summary: Prime World Classic is a game created by fans of the original Prime World. The online game combines two genres at once - RPG and MOBA. Control the castle, collect the strongest builds for your heroes and win on the battlefields in the Praya universe!

name: Project Kunlun
summary: A FAKE bullet hell game. An Indie Game Developed by LZY

name: Protect the Treasure
summary: In a distant future, humanity left Earth and many creatures were left behind. You have to survive in this dangerous world and protect the last treasure left by humans.

name: Princess Shall Prevail
summary: Princess Shall Prevail is a pseudo 8-bit, top-down hack-and-slash game that takes heavy influence from the genre's third-person contemporaries and some influence from scrolling shoot-em-ups. Like how many approach the genres, players will be dodging and timing their attacks accordingly.

name: Project Sever
summary: Project Sever is a fusion of submarine simulator and horror. Master the controls of the Soviet Project "Sever" submarine and learn to keep it in working order to escape the deadly underwater trap and solve the mystery of the Anomalous Zone.

name: Prototype Chaos
summary: Prototype chaos is about our main characters Prototype Guy getting their ice cream stolen by a ghost girl and they are mad so they go get it back.

name: Project Revenant
summary: Project Revenant is a side-scrolling shooter that requires "Precision Aiming" at hitboxes using the cursor.

name: Press&Release
summary: A collection of 8 typing mini games, 7 game modes that can be combined for a total of 128 unique combinations, and over 1,000 leaderboards!. Whether you want to test your typing skills, challenge your memory, or push your reflexes to the limit, this game offers endless replayability.

name: Prism: Master Tape
summary: This is a dystopian soft sci-fi game. One day, you and your family received a flyer from the community to watch a movie for free. Your family has already set off, and you arrived later - but you find out that they are not there. After that, you discover the untold secrets of the medium of "video".

name: Project S.U.N.D.I.A.L
summary: Online PvPvE extraction shooter with hardcore survival mechanics. Explore the wastelands of France, the dark forests of Eastern Europe, and Norway's infamous Hollow Plague Fjord — and beyond. Face off against rival players, ruthless raiders, and the terrifying Hollows.

name: Project Z: The beginning of the end - Chapter I
summary: Tower & Defense game, with Topdown view set in a post-apocalyptic world of zombies.

name: Project Athenia
summary: Project Athenia is a multiplayer first-person shooter in which you can play against your friends in several game modes on many different maps.

name: Pretty Girl Cube
summary: Dive into Pretty Girl Cube, a captivating match-two puzzle game where strategic thinking meets irresistible rewards! Your objective is simple: clear each level by flipping pairs of blocks to reveal matching images. Earn valuable gold coins with every successful match and level completion.

name: Prison Boss: Prohibition - Stitchin' Rich
summary:
Get Rich or Die Stitchin'

Welcome to The Public Place, a charming new district where the mayor’s statue watches over the city like he owns it… because he does. For now.

Set up shop under the fountain’s shadow and meet the Egg White Collars: a new faction of civil servants with threadbare suits, broken dreams, and very questionable taste. They may not be powerful, but they sure are picky.

Use new tools like felting needles and embroidery hoops to stitch, felt, and embroider your way through brand-new recipes. Work with leather, wool, linen and dye to craft everything from cozy sweaters to lumpy teddy bears, leather vests to slightly lopsided hats. It’s clumsy, it’s crafty, it’s chaos.

Become the boss of New Yolk’s least fashionable workforce one crooked stitch at a time.

name: Programming Simulator
summary: In the game, you are a game developer who writes game code according to the tasks assigned by the company. You need to drag and drop nodes and connect them to build a complete behavioral logic!

name: Project Chromata
summary: Generate primary colors and unlock complex mixers to build an intricate production chain. Use your creations to generate Light and restore a vast, explorable Star Chart, unlocking powerful, permanent bonuses with each constellation. Evolve your engine with sophisticated automation to manage production and upgrades, allowing you to focus on cosmic restoration. Uncover the secrets of the void through fragmented lore entries tied to your progress.

name: Project II: Silent Valley
summary: Project II: Silent Valley is a linear, semi-open world dystopian visual novel with card combat and explore. Play as US Navy Officer Hierophan, joining the docile humanoid weapon Osprey to uncover a conspiracy at the underwater base "Silent Valley" and the hidden truths of his missing friend, Ochira.

name: Procemon: You Must Catch Them
summary: A retro-style procedurally generated monster collecting RPG. All glitches, all the time.

name: Press a Button Simulator
summary: Welcome to Press a Button Simulator: a new and exciting twist on modern video games. Gone is the time of tryhards and sweats, and in is the new age of only pressing a button! Will you find all the secrets? Of course not! There is only one: You get to press a button!

name: Propwiz
summary: Hide, seek, and outsmart your opponents in PropWiz — a fast-paced multiplayer party-game. Use clever movement, quick thinking, and special abilities to claim your victory.

name: Project Forestation
summary: "Project Forestation" is a 3D Sonic Fan Game developed in Unreal Engine with an emphasis on Adventure's style gameplay. The game is being created with the aim of gamifying the 3rd season of anime "Sonic X".

name: Project Shadowglass
summary: A stealth-focused immersive sim set within a dark fantasy kingdom. Plan daring heists, infiltrate forbidden locales, and escape with priceless artifacts. Features revolutionary 3D pixel art graphics and lasting consequences where every action could leave a trail back to you.

name: Project Retrograde: The Becoming
summary: In 1995, humanity's last hope—Project Retrograde—collapsed as the underground world was shattered by the ancient parasite L.U.C.A. Play as a bounty hunter symbiotic with parasite, using its dangerous power to save the world, even if it consumes you.

name: Project Mnemosyne
summary: Project Mnemosyne is an adult visual novel based on choices. Embark on a journey with your loyal companion, Kristina. Will she become more than just a friend to you on this adventure? The decision is yours.

name: Project CCTV
summary: Play as squad captain of the Critical Containment Threat Verification division and watch live surveillance feeds from CCTV to report any anomalies and survive the night.

name: Proxy Training Corp
summary: Heroes collect gold, and we use gold to increase staff and buildings, and we collect training points. And heroes get stronger using training points. It is a game that can be enjoyed comfortably without time and limitations.

name: Project: Ether
summary: Project: Ether is a magical sci-fi stealth game about trans witches fighting robots. Stop Time, Be a Witch, Save the World.

name: Project Hangman
summary: Enjoy the classical game of Hangman with friends.

name: Printfarm Simulator
summary: Start with your first 3D printer and grow your printing farm step by step. Manage your printers, organize materials, and fulfill orders while finding the best way to run your business smoothly.

name: Primary Exit
summary: A puzzle game about finding a way out and escape from the office at midnight.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2026
summary: Lead your club to greatness in Pro Basketball Manager 2026! The Basketball Champions League arrives with 53 licensed teams, putting you in charge of every decision as you aim to dominate both domestic and continental basketball.

name: Project 0.1
summary: Project 0.1 is a fast-paced, roguelike action game inspired by Vampire Survivors. With 15 unique skills to unlock and evolve, you must experiment with different builds to survive relentless enemy waves. How long can you survive the chaos?

name: Prism of You
summary: Experiment with emotions in this emergent sandbox simulation by identifying, engaging, and expressing dynamic creatures known as Emoes -- all while trying to maintain balance and uncover the secrets of this mysterious alien world.

name: Pro Soccer Online 2
summary: Pro Soccer Online is back and better than ever. Featuring a newer game engine, and built from the ground up, Pro Soccer Online 2 is a bigger and better version of the 1st one. It offers the same smooth, input based, physics driven gameplay, with lots of additional features and QOL improvements.

name: Progress Bar Deluxe
summary: Loading, loading, loading… when will it ever be ready? Will you finally see the bar reach 100%? In Progress Bar Deluxe, your mission is simple — fill the ultimate progress bar to 100%! Click, upgrade, and wait as you chase that sweet moment of completion.

name: Prince of Darkness Jr.
summary: It's 'Vamps vs Lamps' in this box-pushing, shadow-casting, mind-bending puzzle game. Push blocks, open doors, smash windows, and discover secrets -- but whatever you do, don't touch the light!

name: Project Blur
summary: Project BLUR (code name) is the second game from Maboroshi Artworks.

name: Prism Crush
summary:
Bump into pins with the ball to knock them off platforms coming your way.

Challenge yourself completing levels with given number of balls.

name: Processor Dev Tycoon
summary: Build your own processor empire! Design custom chips, compete with rivals, and dominate the tech industry!

name: Prisoner Breaker
summary: A gay adult game. The warden of a max security prison was violated by 3 inmates. The player needs to figure out which 3 of 20 prisoners were the offenders. The core-game is a detective puzzle, use your logic to figure out the criminals through the information you have gathered in mini-games.

name: Price of Obsession
summary: Price of Obsession is a choice-driven narrative game featuring multiple endings, where your decisions determine who lives, who dies, and who you might fall in love with.

name: Protogen Inc.
summary: Huh, you've never heard of Protogen Inc.? That's strange, because everyone knows it's the best space station in the entire universe, with everything you could ever need!

name: Prsi
summary: A short detective-card-adventure set in a dirty Czech pub. Play cards, get wasted and embark on a journey of self-reflection.

name: Pray or Die: Tactical Defense
summary: PRAY OR DIE is a game that combines the genres of survivor-like, tower defense, MOBA, and action roguelite. Players must build defense towers on the island, equip their sailboat with weapons, and pray to Guardian Spirits for powerful blessings to protect the island from invaders and corruption.

name: ProtoBlue Tower
summary: Reborn as a defense tower, you must now protect a foreign village. Use roguelite mechanics in a mix of tower defense and survivor gameplay to defeat your enemies with powerful upgrades.

name: Protect Gloobi
summary: Protect Gloobi is an arcade-style, Souls-like FPS with a weird and offbeat vibe, where you split your focus between shredding your foes to pieces and replenishing your ammo by playing the game on your phone, during your challenging battles across the galaxy!

name: Project: Knossos
summary: Project: KNOSSOS let´s you and up to 7 friends fight through 4 different gamemodes in levels inspired by real ancient greek temple layouts. Blindly hack away at your frenemies or band together to fight the strongest players. Coop is very optional though because only one can win.

name: Protocol Paradox
summary: Protocol Paradox is a fast-paced roguelike shooter blending twin-stick combat, anomaly-based weapons and branching lore. Survive procedural sectors, customize builds with weapons and passives, face concept-driven bosses, and replay for new revelations.

name: Proton & Electron
summary: Play as Dr. Proton and Electron in a world of ⚡Electromagnetism⚡, where two must collaborate to solve puzzles and restore their broken world.

name: Profana
summary: Profana is a Metroidvania centered around exploration and combat. Kill demons on a holy war while making sick looking combos!

name: Professor Simulator
summary: Professor Simulator is an idle management game where players build their academic career from novice lecturer to established researcher. Players manage their university lab by recruiting students, assembling research teams, publishing papers, and completing projects. Success leads to promotions, lab expansions, and new equipment purchases as they climb the academic ladder.

name: Profit or Peril
summary: A co-op extraction horror game. Dive into shifting spaces, solve puzzles under pressure, grab valuables, and escape together. No quotas—progress by bringing loot home and unlock tougher levels with what you earn.

name: Project: Another Use - Graftage
summary: GRAFTAGE is a solarpunk hacking game where a bug has turned an office building into a cage. As you hack the corrupted machines through puzzles within their allotted runtimes, you bring the trapped denizens of the office building one step closer to freedom with each win you make against the virus.

name: Project Obscure
summary: Solve the physics-based puzzles in a steampunk atmosphere "Enlighten" dark mysteries of an old facility. Delve into a unique experience and KEEP YOUR LIGHT ON.

name: Prototype is !Lisa
summary: Lisa recovers from an accident for her next mission: enter the mainframe complex and connect the Megalocal Recognition system to the main control room. A simple mission.

name: Project Sara
summary: A man who has lost his wife and seeks to escape loneliness and grief begins working as a firewatch in a forest. He meets a girl named Sarah and encounters strange occurrences while uncovering deep family secrets. He learns that not every voice is human and not every farewell signifies an end.

name: Primal Dinosaur Shooter: Dino Killer
summary: Primal Dinosaur Shooter: Dino Killer throws you into an era where dinosaurs once again rule the land. In a hostile environment, you are the last hope to restore balance. Armed with modern weapons and unshakable determination, you face a relentless battle against prehistoric creatures that hunt without mercy. Every step could be your last, and survival depends solely on you.

name: Prisoner of the Ephemeral Kingdom
summary: Fourteen from across the world are abruptly abducted to an isolated structure dubbed "Ephemera Manor". They are strangers, but now forced to partake in an ancient and eerie ritual—"the Feather-Burning Rite". A bloodstained drama spanning millennia has silently unfolded...

name: PreStrafe
summary: PreStrafe is a fast paced, high skill ceiling, competitive movement parkour game with expansive and unforeseen meta where players compete for the best times on official and community levels. Play solo, with friends, or a public lobby.

name: Prospice
summary: Prospice blends tense driving and atmospheric horror as you haul cursed cargo across a haunted island, where the terrain hungers and every road bears the scars of the past.

name: Primal Echo
summary: Escape from an alien megastructure that harbors an ancient ecosystem. Climb, fight and bite your way through a retro-inspired metroidvania that fuses survival with 3D action-platformers.

name: Protocol: Umbra
summary: Protocol: Umbra is an unsettling, observation-driven psychological horror game inspired by I’m on Observation Duty and FNaF, built in Python with Pygame-CE and powered by my own UI framework, Tessella.

name: Project Tal
summary: An open-world action Korean mythology RPG. Players will explore a detailed and in-depth world across a single-player adventure inspired by ancient folklore that reimagines Korea’s traditional Tal masks. Engage with an array of threats from massive monsters to formidable swordsmen, making use of enemy weak points, counterattacks, unique abilities, and more.

name: ProMods Europe
summary: ProMods is a community project which expands the Euro Truck Simulator 2 experience greatly, adding and rebuilding 300+ cities and thousands of Kilometers of road to make a more realistic and varied European driving experience.

name: Project Titan: The Redacted Files
summary: Join Special Agent Detective Trevor Vanguard as he uncovers a world ending threat in the downtrodden mega city of Dynawatch. Explore, shoot and survive in this Action Adventure Sci-fi thriller and uncover the truth!

name: Prehistoric Fun Park
summary: Old java game about building a park.

name: Pro Jank Footy
summary: Pro Jank Footy is an over-the-top arcade comedy-sports game. Score goals to unleash game-changing power-ups, build a deck of absurd abilities, and tackle a season where no two matches are ever the same—solo or with your mates.

name: Priest Simulator: Her Ghost
summary:
Her Ghost is an add-on containing a quest that continues the events of Vampire Show. A little funny, even more a little pathetic, but one of a kind. That is, one of a kind in the same way as Heavy Duty and Vampire Show, which makes it one third of a kind.

You'll have a few stupid dialogues and cutscenes and three additional exorcisms. This time, the tooth fairy has caused trouble in San de Ville, and Cardinal Godspeed, known from Infernal Radiation, will come to Orlok's aid.

name: Prophet Margin
summary: The Gods hunger for tribute! Build settlements and weave trade routes, feed temples and earn divine boons in this Eurogame-inspired strategy game.

name: Protean Fox
summary: "Protean Fox" is a bullet shooting game that combines elements of creature capture and light roguelike gameplay. Players will take on the role of a girl who gains the power of the Protean Fox. In her quest to reclaim the Foxfire, she wields weapons and magical artifacts from different worlds.

name: Predators
summary: Welcome to the Jurassic arena. You are a prisoner, forced into life or death games against prehistoric dinosaurs for the entertainment of others with up to 3 friends. Enter the arena, solve the puzzle, live another day.

name: Prickly Pistoleros
summary: The Wild West was never this prickly. Duel it out as sharp-shootin’ cacti with guns, traps, and dirty tricks up your spines. Quick to pick up, wild to master, every showdown is a gamble in Prickly Pistoleros

name: Prichal
summary: Prichal is a 1-4 player cooperative survival horror game. Team up to solve the ominous puzzles of each unique map and uncover its dark history.

name: Project X
summary: Welcome to Project X, a first-person survival horror experience that traps you in the cold, dark corridors of an abandoned subway station. What begins as a routine visit turns into a chilling fight for your life when you find yourself trapped underground and you're not alone. Something is down here.

name: Promotion
summary: Promotion is a short VR escape room set in the far future. The player is trapped on a spaceship and must unlock the escape pod before time runs out.

name: Protocol: Terminate
summary: A co-op survival horror shooter against an AI that learns from your actions. It grows more dangerous, relentlessly hunts you, and turns mistakes into deadly traps. Hide, hack security systems, and work together to survive.

name: Protox.io
summary:
Protox.io is a fast-paced first-person multiplayer shooter set in voxel-based maps.
It runs directly in your browser, completely free and with no download required. The gameplay is quick, fun and perfect for jumping in at any time.

Play with friends, collect unique skins, compete in clan wars, and become part of a creative and passionate community. Build and share your own maps, join community events, and help us shape the future of Protox.

name: Project Diva: Megamix - F Edition
summary: Project Diva: F (both PSVITA and PS3) mod that adds Future Tone and Megamix songs to Project Diva: F

name: Prizma Puzzle Classic
summary: An addictive sci-fi puzzle game features 28 cleverly designed levels. The player's task is to build a beam from point A to point B, through objects that have different functionality.

name: Prerolled
summary:
Welcome to your very own dice shop!

Acquire dice, alter them with stickers and pack them into various boxes in this number go up roguelike dice builder.

You will get new dice and new stickers by making your clients happy (or you can get greedy and just sell them the most expensive combo you'll come up with)

name: Progenitor
summary: Progenitor is a space adventure/strategy game. You play as Kenny, a space pirate searching for his long-lost father. There are over a dozen explorable planets where you can buy and sell goods and perform tasks. Demand for goods (and their prices) change based on the characteristics of the planet you're on.

name: Pronoun Palace
summary: Pronoun Palace is a word-spelling roguelike set in a dystopian future where the government has taken your pronouns. Use spells to manipulate letter tiles, catch fish, and abuse amphetamines to defeat the Party and get your pronouns back!

name: Project P.I.T.T.
summary: Feed rubber ducks to a corporate void. Build physics contraptions. Chain combos for profit as the Maw grows hungrier... and larger. Brutalist PSX satire meets first-person sandbox chaos.

name: Project Yoake
summary: Save the world by changing the past! Explore the planets through portals, solve puzzles and collect the keys. In the finale, you will travel back in time to stop the creation of androids.

name: Project Raze: Fall of Terra
summary: Project RAZE is a fast-paced sci-fi FPS where you play as humanity’s greatest creation, RZ-01 (RAZE) Feel every shot and every impact as you obliterate anyone bold enough to threaten the human homeworld, Terra Supremis.

name: Princess of Frozen Flowers
summary: 3 dungeons, 3 days, 3 power sources. Princess of Frozen Flowers is a time management dungeon RPG where you are tasked with finishing each dungeon on time as each day gets increasingly more difficult.

name: Project: Station
summary: A 4-player co-op sci-fi horror game where you stealth through unstable research stations, scavenge vital resources, complete high-risk contracts, and extract before the facility overwhelms your team.

name: Pripyat 0
summary: Chernobyl has broken down. As radiation rains down upon you, the world starts rapidly mutating. You've gotten stuck in a nightmarish loop. Can you correctly spot the anomalies on time and get to safety? Or will you become one with the zone?

name: Prime Rush
summary: Prime Rush is a next-generation mobile battle royale featuring fast matches, high-skill gunplay, and a unique extraction system that lets players choose how they win. Drop into Maré, fight across tight urban environments, collect rare Cosmium, and either survive to the end or extract mid-match for an instant victory.

name: Preserve: Ice Age
summary: Expand Preserve into the Ice Age! Shape frozen landscapes, guide glaciers, and nurture prehistoric megafauna in harmony with your evolving ecosystem.

name: Primus Numen
summary: A tactical RPG love-letter to Final Fantasy Tactics and Suikoden. Build classes, unleash combos, and awaken the evolving Nexus Beast - born from the bond between friends. Every choice shapes your team, every battlefield tells a story and only when one falls will the Seven-Pointed Star awaken.

name: Project.Tasker
summary: In a world where physical death is no longer possible, artificial intelligence is created to free people from mental death. However, would it be right to do such a thing? Wouldn't erasing someone's memories to replace them be the same as erasing them?

name: Proppi
summary: Proppi is a playful competitive hide-and-seek game. Disguise, deceive, and discover—it’s all about outsmarting your friends and having a blast together!

name: Project Timbre
summary: Control the squishy hero, Timbre, as you jump, dash, and dive onto enemies and gather power gems in this bite-sized 3D platformer!

name: Pritto Prisoner: Deco Set - Hamburger Pack
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Biped Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Biped Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Blowgun Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Blowgun Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Butterfly Net Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Butterfly Net Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Dear Ruth
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Dr. Psycho
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Lasso Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Lasso Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Master Shion
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Mr. Multi
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Multi-Leg Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Multi-Leg Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Stun Gun Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Stun Gun Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Tank Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Tank Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Wheels Skin: Bloody
Pritto Prisoner: DLC Skin - Wheels Skin: Camouflage
Pritto Prisoner: Robot Skin - Bloody Pack
Princess Burst
summary: Princess Burst is an interactive (QTE gameplay) wrestling fighting game. Join Yuki Sakurano as she fights in illegal underground wrestling matches as she aims to climb to the very top!

name: Prism Wilds
summary: You wake up on a beautiful island, with no memory of how you got there. Stranded, you and 6 strangers must survive, explore, and make this island your home all while uncovering that mystery. Farm, fish, build a home, decorate, form relationships, and uncover the truth hidden in the mountains.

name: Pratfall
summary: A co-op game where you fall, dig, and explode your way down a dangerous cave system to find your lost dog. Catch your friends and watch your step on this journey full of traps, hazards, and the most deadly force of all: gravity. Will you jump into the unknown to rescue your dog?

name: President of Steel
summary: President of Steel is a choice-driven political strategy game where every decision shapes the fate of your nation. Balance power, stability, and economy while navigating political intrigue, war threats, organized crime, and personal relationships.

name: Project Killdance
summary: Project KILLDANCE is a Noir tactical action featuring a one-army strategy and instant-death combat. Slowly observe surroundings, choreograph each killing move, leave no survivor, and become the spectral death.

name: Promethean Hive Wave Defense
summary: A simple wave defense game against a hive of creatures, luckily you are a group of highly skilled combat engineers who can craft the necessary weaponry to ensure your survival.

name: Princess Miner
summary: Princess Miner is a Gold Miner-style Roguelike game. You play as a Princess who loves money more than tiaras. Equip your gear, and drag up every nugget in sight. This game shatters the traditional "single hook" mechanic—why fire one hook when you can fire them all?

name: Professor Galaktionov Dawn of the Robopocalypse
summary: Embark on an incredible adventure with the eccentric genius Professor Galaktionov and his voice assistant Sara! You’ll unravel the mysteries of the universe and experience mind-blowing escapades.

name: Primal Blue
summary: Survive and thrive as a sea creature in a vast online ocean. Hunt, evolve, and adapt in a dynamic underwater world filled with danger, mystery, and other players. Will you rise as an apex predator or vanish beneath the waves?

name: Princess Khalifa: Legacy of Wrath
summary: Princess Khalifa: Legacy of Wrath is a fast-paced top-down action shooter where you dash, slow time, and fight through escalating enemy waves in a surreal sci-fi world, relying on precise movement, quick reactions, and controlled chaos to survive.

name: Primal Frost
summary: A singleplayer hardcore prehistoric arctic experience. Collect all the nests and wait for extraction. 15 - 45 minutes of gameplay. NOTE: This game is challenging! Defend yourself from feathered raptors, hide in tall brush, and keep your shotgun loaded.

name: Project R4T
summary: Take control of a test subject tasked with testing out a new device capable of shrinking and enlarging the user. Take on a few tests by changing your size and weight in this short single-player experience.

name: Presentfall: Santa Defense
summary: Presentfall: Santa Defense is a short, action, tower defense game where you help Santa defend his last presents from endless waves of naughty invaders. Aim, react, and throw snowballs to save Christmas. Collect rewards, improve Santa's skills and unlock bonuses!

name: Project Atlas
summary: Inspired by the 3I/Atlas commet, Project Atlas is a story-driven sci-fi narrative following Commander Simth as she tracks a mysterious object through deep space and discovers a truth no one is prepared for.

name: Project Noch
summary: Project Noch is a winter-themed driving and taxi game set in a post-war city. Drive through quiet nights, deliver passengers, and experience a calm, atmospheric world focused on immersion and slow-paced driving rather than speed or competition.

name: Project: Jurit
summary: A zombie survival horror game set in a haunting Indonesian school. Combining atmospheric tension with a deeply engaging narrative, Project: JURIT explores the horrors of survival, friendship, and human nature in the face of a supernatural outbreak.

name: Praxium
summary: Praxium is a 2D precision platformer that blends fast-paced movement with strategic deckbuilding. Gain movement abilities, transform scoring rules, and even modify levels themselves to achieve the highest score possible while running, jumping, and sliding across 100 levels of pure platforming fun!

name: Protocol Nightmare
summary: Survive three nights of absolute terror while more than 10 monsters hunt you down. Explore secret paths, complete tasks, use your flashlight and scanner, upgrade your abilities, and face an intense survival experience.

name: Private Ward: VIP Floor - She Was My Nurse
summary: authentic Visual Novel. Enter the specialized world of the 'Hospital'—a setting loved by many—specifically the exclusive VIP Floor. Here, you will experience a thrilling and deep relationship with a captivating nurse heroine, 'Leah', through the eyes of 'Ethan'.

name: Protocol Solari: Escape Room
summary: Awaken alone aboard a drifting colony ship under autonomous lockdown. Restore critical systems, solve interconnected puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the Solari Protocol before you and the colonists depending on you are lost to the void.

name: Project North
summary: A first-person submarine exploration game, where the you write and sketch your story as you navigates the frozen depths, manages the submarine's systems and come ever closer to uncovering the never-seen secrets beneath the ice.

name: Prison Breaker
summary: Dodge, charge, and destroy! In this prison attack challenge, it's you versus the obstacles standing between you and the ultimate goal: smashing the prison to bits. Ready to break some walls? Let the mayhem begin!

name: Project Salon
summary: You're a barber in a city full of beastfolk. Chat with your customers, style their look, help them see something new in the mirror... and in themselves.

name: Project: Doors
summary: What if every door opened into a world that shouldn’t exist? Project: Doors throws your squad into a shifting maze packed with traps, anomalies, and creatures you’d rather not meet. Stick together, solve strange puzzles - and try to escape in one piece

name: Primal Reign: The Age of New Kings
Protect the Pit
summary: A short incremental clicker game that blends the strategy of tower defense with the depth of sprawling upgrade trees. Build your own winding mazes to repel the oncoming hordes!

name: Project Atlas
summary: In a universe where everything is falling into chaos, one person and their new found companion are out to save the universe from total destruction. Experience heart pounding battle action, animal handling skills, survival skills, and even some fishing along the way. Includes solo story mode, multiplayer 6v6 team death match, and a battle royale. Set in the near future where humans battle resource deprivation, and climate change on worlds. Yet off world threats are the real danger! Battle through countless missions with your customizable K-9 companion. Can the universe be saved or was it doomed from the start?

name: Project_8
summary: Project_8 is a first-person survival horror and investigation game developed by ZNT Productions. The player takes on the role of Edward Vonthorn, a young scientist, inventor, and traveler who infiltrates the corporation Archange Inc. to investigate suspicious activities, only to become trapped within its underground laboratories. As he struggles to survive, Edward must explore dangerous environments, confront unknown threats, and uncover the secrets behind experiments that have spiraled out of control. The narrative blends tension, investigation, and immersive horror, supported by atmospheric environments and voice acting designed to deepen player immersion.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Jotun Predator
summary: Viewed by his own clan as a bloodthirsty aberration, the Jotun Predator lives for the sheer thrill of the kill rather than the honor of the hunt. He is defined by his brutality and savagery.

name: Primitive Fear
summary: An atmospheric horror game where you try to survive the night by your campfire from ice age predators and creatures. Use fire and your primitive wits to prevent yourself from being somethings meal.
